loans.use: the purchase of tools and seeds

loans.name: Estrellas 1 Group

texts.es: Esta foto fue tomada en la casa D. la señora Maria del Rosario, una integrante del grupo D. Estrellas 1,que está ubicado en el estado D. Veracruz México.Se ven las 10 integrantes del grupo en la foto. Ella se dedica a la venta D. lenceria, zapatos, y cosméticos por catálogo, inició hace 5 años. Solicita el prestamo para la compra D. más producto para sus ventas. Sus ganancias van aumentando por la variedad que tiene en su pequeño negocio. Al momento D. solicitar este prestamo se siente satisfecha y contenta por el prestamo. Tiene 45 años estudió hasta el bachillerato, es madre tiene 3 hijos; 2 mujeres y 1 varón. Quiere este crédito para la compra D. más producto para sus ventas. También espera obtener más ganancias y darles una mejor calidad D. vida a su familia.Leticia P., es la presidenta del grupo tiene  42 años , estudio hasta secundaria, ella se dedica a la venta D. ropa, que inicio hace 8 años, solicita el prestamo para la compra D. más ropa. el grupo está conformado por 11 integrantes.
texts.en:
This photo was taken in the home of Mrs Maria del Rosario, a member of the Estrellas 1 ["Stars 1"] group. This group is located in the state of Veracruz, Mexico. The 10 group members are seen in the photo. Maria works selling lingerie, shoes and cosmetics through a catalogue. She started this five years ago. 
She is requesting this loan for the purchase of more products for her sales. Her earnings are increasing because of the variety of stock in her small business. At the moment of requesting this loan, she feels satisfied and happy with it. 
She is 45 and studied up to a bachelor's degree. She is a mother of three children; 2 girls and one boy. She wants this loan for the purchase of more products for her sales. She also hopes to make more income and offer her family a better quality of life. 
Leticia P is the group president. She is 42 and studied until high school. She sells clothing, and started doing this 8 years ago. She is requesting this loan for the purchase of more clothing. This group is maD. up of 11 members.

loans.use: to invest in merchandise.

loans.name: Jorge Nicolás

texts.es:
Jorge Nicolás S. S., tiene 32 años, es casado vive con su esposa en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tiene 3 hijos de diferentes edades

Le gusta hacer amigos y ser sociable.

The members of the V.R.C. Ciudadela Los Angeles are located in the Los Angeles district, belonging to the Ventanas Canton. The 14 members of this community bank work in short-cycle agriculture sowing corn and rice.
Jorge Nicolas works in agriculture sowing corn. He purchases his products in Farma-Agro and sells in the same location.
He is requesting this loan for sowing corn and purchasing supplies and seeds. The support of this loan will help him economically to supply his needs. He confronts challenges such as plagues, diseases and the varied climate. His dream is to be a good professional.
He enjoys making friends and being social.

loans.name: Future Ladies Group

texts.en: Hawa K. is the leader of this group of entrepreneurs. Hawa is 52 years old, widowed, and has seven children, five of whom attend school and two of whom are adults.  She was born in Kailahum town in eastern Sierra Leone.  For 21 years, Hawa has been selling clothes, jeans, slippers, baby powder, etc. This is the first loan that Hawa and her group members have applied for from SMT/Kiva lenders. With the help of this loan, they will be able to expand their businesses, make more sales, and consequently improve their living conditions. Hawa will use her share of the loan (500,000 SLL) to expand her business; she will buy the above mentioned items at wholesale to add to her current inventory.

loans.use: To purchase clothes, jeans, slippers, baby powder, etc.

loans.name: Justino Ignacio

texts.es:
Justino Ignacio S. V., tiene 43 años, vive en unión libre con su esposa, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tiene 5 hijos de diferentes edades 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. CIUDADELA LOS ANGELES se encuentran ubicados en el recinto Los Ángeles, pertenece al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla de 14 miembros se dedica a las labores agrícolas en ciclo corto de siembra de maíz,

Le gusta hacer amigos y ser sociable.

The members of the V.R.C. Ciudadela Los Angeles are located in the Los Angeles district, belonging to the Ventanas Canton. The 14 members of this community bank work in short-cycle agriculture sowing corn and rice.
Justino Ignacio works in agriculture sowing corn. He purchases his products in Ecua-Agro and sells in the same location.
He is requesting this loan for sowing corn and purchasing supplies and seeds. The support of this loan will help him economically to supply his needs. He confronts challenges such as plagues, diseases and the varied climate. His dream is to have his own home.
He enjoys making friends and being social.

loans.use: the purchase of supplies and seeds

loans.name: Luz

texts.es: Luz, de 23 años, es una mujer muy alegre y trabajadora, vive en casa alquilada junto a su conviviente Rubén (30)  y sus 2 pequeños hijos, quienes son el motivo de todos sus esfuerzos.Con el único deseo de sacar adelante a su familia, Luz comienza a vender desde muy temprano en su negocio de ropas, las prendas que vende la compra en  la ciudad de Lima, motivo por el cual son rápidamente compradas, pues son muy  novedosas. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es aconsejar a sus clientes sobre las prendas que mejor les quedan, ya que así puede ganarse el cariño de sus compradores, ya lleva 3 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus fardos  de prendas desde la ciudad de Lima, ya que esta actividad la cansa mucho. Con el tiempo, desea aumentar otras novedades en su negocio, donde pueda atender mejor a sus clientes con otras variedades.Este es el primer préstamo de Luz Marina con MFP, sabe que tiene que pagar sus cuotas puntualmente y esta dispuesta a hacerlo. En su banco comunal es una socia muy querida, ya que es muy solidaria.Con los dos mil soles solicitados, comprará más ropa de la ciudad de Lima, con lo cual implementara mejor su stock de ventas, de esta manera espera continuar progresando.
texts.en:
Luz is 23 years old.  She is a very happy and hard-working woman who lives in a rental house together with her partner Rubén (30) and her two young children who are the motivation behind all her hard work.

With the sole desire of getting her family ahead in life, Luz starts work in her clothes business very early in the morning.  She buys the clothes that she sells in the city of Lima which means that they sell very quickly since they are the latest fashions.  What Luz most likes about her work is advising her customers about which clothes suit them best since, in this way, she can gain the affection of her buyers.  She has been in this business for 3 years and she considers the most difficult part of her work to be transporting her bundles of clothes from the city of Lima since it is very tiring.  Over time, Luz would like to add other new items to her business, providing her customers with a better service by giving them more variety.

This is Luz' first loan with MFP.  She knows that she must make her repayments on time and she is prepared to do this.  She is a very well-liked member of her community bank since she is very supportive.  She will use the 2,000 Peruvian soles she has requested to buy more clothes in the city of Lima with which she will increase her sales stock.  In this way, she hopes to continue making progress.

loans.use: To buy merchandise (clothes) to improve her business

loans.name: Leonardo Eulogio

loans.name: Mujeres En Accion 1 & 2 Group

texts.en:
Adelsy is a single mother with four children. She shares her home with her father, in a house made of cement block, in a village structured as a Batey, a small town surrounded by sugar cane fields, in San Pedro. Bateyes are poor rural communities built by sugar companies to house their field workers. Over time, conditions in these communities have deteriorated heavily and houses are in poor shape. Bateyes typically lack potable water, any kind of reliable electricity and sufficient medical services.

Adelsy is the coordinator for her group, Mujeres en Accion (Women in Action), groups 1 & 2 of around 7 other groups in her community. Most of the members of these groups are Haitians immigrants or part Dominicans, and Adelsy's story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican (many of whom recently emigrated to the DR from Haiti) clients generally.

Adelsy operates a comedor (a small neighborhood restaurant), where she cooks lunch, with sugar cane workers as her main customers. She will invest this loan to buy vegetables, rice, oil, and other goods to prepare the lunches. She hopes that with profits from her business she can eventually purchase her own home. Adelsy also looks forward to continuing to develop her business which allows her to support her children and raise them with good health and education.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, rice and other goods

loans.name: Los Lirios Rojos Group

texts.es: Esta foto fue tomada en el negocio de la Señora Maria E. Una integrante del grupo Los Lirios Rojos, que está ubicado en Tehuacan en el estado de Puebla en México. El nombre del grupo lo retoman de una de las plantas más características de esta comunidad, se ve el local donde la señora efectua la venta de abarrotes, ella inició este negocio hace diez años, solicita el prestamo para la compra de abarrotes pudiendo asi ampliar y surtir su tienda. Sus clientes prefieren comprar con ella porque da a buen precio y siempre encuentran lo que buscan, dicen sus clientes que su amabilidad y atención destaca mucho sobre la competencia y que le han ayudado hacer crecer su negocio. Al momento de solicitar su crédito ella se siente contenta y con mucho entusiasmo.Tiene 38 años de edad y estudio hasta el sexto año de primaria, es casada y tiene dos hijos: una mujer y un varón de diez y ocho años de edad respectivamente. Quiere el crédito para la ampliación y abastecimiento de su negocio. Dentro de sus proyectos familiares ella quiere terminar la construcción de su casa.
texts.en:
This photo was taken in the business of Mrs Maria E, a member of the Los Lirios Rojos ["The Red Irises"] group, which is located in Tehuacan in the state of Puebla, in Mexico. They took their group name from one of the most characteristic plants of their community.
In the photo we see the location where Mrs Maria sells groceries. She started this business ten years ago. She is requesting this loan for the purchase of groceries in order to expand and stock her store. Her customers prefer to buy from her because she offers good prices and always has what they're looking for. Her customers say that her kindness and attentiveness make her stand out against the competition and have allowed her business to grow. 
She is happy and has a great deal of enthusiasm. She is 38 and studied until grade 6. She is married and has two children: one girl and one boy, ages 10 and 8 respectively. She would like this loan in order to expand and stock her business. Among her goals for her family, she wants to finish building her house.

loans.use: for the expansion and stocking of the business.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.use: the purchase of tools and seeds

loans.name: Touba

texts.fr: Monsieur Touba est un jeune qui vit à Fissel une communauté rurale située a quelque 50 km de Mbour . Il est célibataire et travaille dans ce secteur depuis 2008. Son activité principale est la réparation de téléphone portable et ventes de téléphones et accessoires. Ces produits il les achète à Dakar et il est très connu dans ce métier et il a des clients qui viennent dans les villages environnants. Il sollicite ce crédit pour renforcer ses activités dans le secteur
texts.en: Mr. Touba is a young man living in Fissel, a rural community about 50 km from Mbour. He is single and works in this line of business since 2008. His main business activity is repairing mobile phones and selling phones and accessories. He stocks up on his wares in Dakar. He is very well known and has customers who travel to see him from nearby villages. He is seeking a loan in order to strengthen his business.

loans.use: Retail

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.es: Marcelina, de 51 años, es viuda y tiene una hija. Residen en la localidad de Quimbiri, ubicada en la selva tropical cusqueña, donde habitan una  casa alquilada.Marcelina recuerda que hace mucho tiempo no tenia nada, pero ella tenia conocimiento de las técnicas de  sembrío y cosecha del cacao, y así  incursionó en producir y comercializar estos productos, y  agradece a su familia por la ayuda que le brindaron en los momentos más difíciles. Hoy vende su producto a los grandes mayoristas a un precio competitivo, con la finalidad de poder diversificar su mercado, siempre se encuentra muy atenta ante cualquier aparición de plagas que puedan afectar sus plantaciones de cacao. Por lo general su producto los vende en los centros de acopio de su misma localidad, y su rutina diaria es desde 6  de la mañana hasta las 5  de la tarde. Tiene planeado  obtener más tierras y seguir en el sembrío del cacao y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.Este es su dieciseisavo crédito con MFP, por el cual se compromete a seguir cumpliendo con sus obligaciones de pago, además agradece a la institución por la responsabilidad que  ejercen.Con el dinero que solicita invertirá en contratar jornaleros para hace trabajar su parcela, de esta manera espera salir adelante.
texts.en:
Marcelina is 51 years old.  She is a widow and has one daughter with whom she lives, in a rental house, in the town of Quimbiri, in the tropical Cusco jungle.

Marcelina remembers that a long time ago she didn't have anything at all but she knew how to sow and harvest cacao and she thereby broke into the market producing and selling these products.  She is grateful to her family for the help they gave her in her most difficult moments.  Today, Marcelina sells her products to the big wholesalers at a competitive price, with the aim of being able to diversify her market.  She is always very attentive to any appearance of pests on her crops as they can ravage her cacao plantations.  In general, she sells her products in the warehouse centers in her own town and her daily routine runs from 6.00am to 5.00pm.  Marcelina plans to obtain more land and to continue sowing cacao and improving her family's quality of life.

This is Marcelina's 16th loan with MFP.  She pledges to continue making her repayments on time.  She is grateful to the institution for the responsibility that they exercise.  She will invest the money she is requesting in hiring laborers to work on her plot of land.  In this way, she hopes to get ahead in life.

loans.use: To pay laborers to help her with her crops

loans.name: Goyah Group

texts.en:
Jeneba A. is the leader of this group of entrepreneurs. Jeneba was born in Tongo, a town in eastern Sierra Leone. She is twenty-seven years of age. Jeneba is married to a professional worker, and the couple has two children – one in primary school and one in secondary school.

For eight years now, Jeneba has been selling palm oil (the most popular cooking oil). This is the first loan that Jeneba and her group members have applied for from SMT/Kiva lenders. With the help of this loan, they will be able to expand their businesses, make more sales and consequently, improve  their living conditions. 

Jeneba will use her share of the loan (SLL 500,000) to buy palm oil at wholesale to add to her business stock.

loans.use: To buy palm oil at wholesale to add to her business

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.es: Marcelina, de 40 años, vive con su esposo Rogelio (45); y sus dos jóvenes hijos,  juntos habitan su casa propia en un paraje ubicado en la selva peruana.Marcelina se dedica al cultivo de cacao, coca, café y plátanos en el centro poblado de Palmapampa, distrito de Samugari y desde hace 30 años trabaja sola. Cada mañana con la salida del alba, Marcelina empieza su  rutinaria que consiste en desmontar, regar, tratar de que las plagas no perjudiquen sus cultivos. Y cuando es tiempo de cosecha necesita la ayuda de  peones, para poder hacerlo con mayor  cuidado; le encanta trabajar en su chacra porque le gusta mucho la naturaleza, a veces suele enojarse porque los peones no hacen el trabajo correcto sin embargo  los frutos que cosecha le son rentables porque sus ventas son normales y sus productos se venden bien  en el centro de acopio de su pueblo. Como es una mujer emprendedora para el futuro tiene planeado  sembrar hoja de  coca porque es una planta bastante  rentable.Es su sexto préstamo con MFP, y asegura que no fallara con las fechas de pago, porque no quiere defraudar a todas las personas que hicieron posible el crédito.Marcelina tiene planeado invertir los dos mil soles solicitados en  la compra de abono, para preservar la calidad de sus productos, de esta manera espera seguir progresando.
texts.en:
Marcelina is 40 years old.  She lives with her husband, Rogelio (45), and her two young children, in their own home in the Peruvian jungle.  Marcelina grows cacao, coca, coffee and bananas in the village of Palmapampa, in Samugari district.  She has worked alone for 30 years.

Every morning at dawn, Marcelina starts her daily routine which consists of irrigating her land and making sure that pests do not jeopardize her crops.  At harvest time, she needs the help of laborers so that she can do her work more carefully.  She enjoys working on her plantation because she really likes nature.  Sometimes she gets annoyed because the laborers don't do their work properly but the fruits that she harvests are profitable because her sales are ok and her products sell well in the warehouse centers in her village.  As she is an enterprising woman, in the future she plans to start sowing coca leaf because this is quite a profitable plant.

This is Marcelina's sixth loan with MFP and she assures us that she will not fail to make her repayments on time as she does not want to let down the people who have made her loan possible.  Marcelina plans to invest the 2,000 Peruvian soles that she has requested in buying manure to preserve the quality of her products.  In this way, she hopes to continue making progress.

loans.use: To buy manure to improve her crops

loans.name: Diarra

texts.fr: Madame Diarra D. est une commerçante qui vit à fissel avec son mari et ses parents. Elle est dans le commerce depuis prés de 5ans. La boutique constitue pour elle un gagne pain car le bénéfice issu de la vente de détail lui permet de faire face à certains problèmes.Elle sollicite ce prêt pour renforcer sa boutique et accroitre sa rentabilité
texts.en: Mrs. Diarra D. is a merchant who lives in Fissel with her husband and her parents. She has been in business for close to 5 years. Her store is a source of income for her and as a retail store owner she is able to overcome certain problems. She requests a loan to resupply her store and to increase her earnings.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise.

loans.name: Fena

texts.es:
Fena tiene 39 años, es una mujer muy sencilla y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Godoy, de 28 años, y sus 2 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida.

Aunque Fena nunca pudo realizar estudios superiores, siempre trató de sobresalir y demostrar que podía llevar una vida normal. Actualmente se dedica al cultivo de plátano y café, actividad que aprendió desde muy pequeña y que ahora le brinda los ingresos necesarios para mantener a su familia.
Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cosechar sus tierras y lo hace siempre con una sonrisa; lleva 10 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es fumigar sus cultivos, ya que los químicos que usa son muy peligrosos. Con el tiempo, desea comprar nuevas tierras para ampliar la cantidad de sus cultivos.

Este es el segundo préstamo de Fena con MFP y quiere pagar sus cuotas a tiempo, ya que desea acceder a más préstamos con lo cuales pueda mejorar su negocio, pues sabe que en su banco comunal la apoyarán y la guiarán, ya que es una socia muy querida.
Con los ochocientos nuevos soles solicitados comprará más abono para hacer más fértiles sus tierras.
texts.en:
Fena is 39 years old; she is a very humble and hardworking woman. She lives in her own home together with her husband, Godoy, who is 28 years old, and their two beloved children. She wishes to provide them with a better quality of life. 

Although Fena was never able to go to high school, she has always tried to improve herself and to demonstrate that she can have a normal life. Currently she has a banana and coffee plantation, a business she learned since she was very young. This business today provides her with the income she needs to support her family. 

What she most enjoys about her work is to harvest the fields and she always does it with a smile on her face. She has 10 years in the business and the most difficult part of her work is to fumigate the plantations, especially because the chemicals she uses are very dangerous. With time she hopes to purchase more land to expand the quantity of her cultivations.

This is Fena's second loan through MFP (Kiva Field Partner) and she plans on making her payments on time. She wants to be able to access other loans in the future to improve her business. She knows that her communal bank will support her and guide her, especially because she is appreciated as a member. 

With the eight hundred nuevos soles requested, she will purchase more fertilizer to make her land more fertile.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizer.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.es:
Gladys tiene 35 años, es una mujer muy amable y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Elías, de 36 años, y sus 5 hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida.

Gladys pasa sus días trabajando en sus cultivos, ella es muy dedicada y pone todo su esfuerzo en que sus productos tengan la mayor calidad posible. Esta actitud ha hecho que sus plátanos, café y cacao sean muy solicitados en el mercado de Pichanaki, que es donde lleva a vender sus productos.
Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es sembrar, y lo hace con mucho esmero; lleva 2 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos, ya que los sacos de cultivos son muy pesados. Para más adelante, espera comprar nuevas tierras para incrementar su producción.

Este es el primer préstamo de Gladys con MFP, espera ser muy puntual en sus pagos y no tener problemas con su banco comunal, donde es la encargada de poner la cuota de alegría que mantiene a las demás socias muy felices.
Con los quinientos nuevos soles solicitados comprará más abono para fertilizar sus cultivos
texts.en:
Gladys, age 35, is a very kind and hard-working woman.  She lives in her own house with her 36 year old husband, Elías, and their five children.  She wishes to give them a better quality of life.

Gladys spends her days working on her crops.  She is very dedicated, and she puts forth all of her effort so that her products will be of the best possible quality.  This attitude has created a great demand in the Pichanaki market for her bananas, coffee, and cacao.  This market is where she takes her products to sell.

What she likes the most about her work is planting, which she does with great care.  She has been doing this business activity for two years.  She considers transporting her products to be the most difficult part.  The sacks of crops are very heavy.

Later, she hopes to buy new land to increase her production.

This is Gladys’ first loan with MFP.  She plans on being very punctual with her payments and on having no problems with her communal bank.  In her communal bank she is the one to bring in the joy that makes other members very happy.

She will use the requested 500 soles to buy fertilizer for her crops.

loans.use: To buy natural and chemical fertilizers

loans.name: Ivan

texts.es:
Iván tiene 26 años, es un hombre muy alegre y trabajador, vive en su casa propia y lo que más desea es sobresalir en la vida.

Los largos días de trabajo que Iván tiene en sus chacras, lo han hecho ver que tiene que trabajar muy duro para lograr una buena calidad en sus cultivos. Todas las mañanas, junto a los primeros rayos de sol, camina hasta sus chacras de café, plátano, cacao y palta, las cuales se ubican a una hora de camino aproximadamente.
Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cultivar sus tierras y lo hace con mucho esmero, lleva 10 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es fumigar sus tierras, ya que los químicos que usa son muy peligrosos. Para más adelante, espera comprar nuevas tierras para ampliar sus cultivos.

Este es el segundo préstamo de Iván con MFP, sabe que tiene que pagar sus cuotas puntualmente si desea acceder a otro crédito posteriormente. En su banco comunal es un socio muy participativo.
Con los mil nuevos soles solicitados comprará más abono para sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Iván, age 26, is a very happy and hard-working man.  He lives in his own house.  What he wants most of all is to succeed in life.

The long work days that Iván has in his fields have made him see that he has to work very hard to obtain a good quality of crops.  Every morning, together with the sun’s first rays, he walks to his coffee, banana, cacao, and avocado fields.  The fields are approximately an hour away.

What he likes most about his work is cultivating his land, which he does with great care.  He has been doing this for ten years.  What he considers to be the most difficult is fumigating his land because the chemicals he uses are very dangerous.

Later, he hopes to buy more land to increase his crops.

This is Ivan’s second loan with MFP.  He knows that he has to make his payments on time if he wants to have access to another loan in the future.  He is a very active participant in his communal bank.

He will use the requested 1,000 soles to buy more fertilizer for his crops.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer

loans.name: Loida

texts.es:
Loida tiene 41 años, es una mujer muy amable y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Camilo, de 46 años, y sus 3 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida.

Trabajando arduamente, Loida ha logrado sacar adelante sus sembríos, pues todas las mañanas se levanta muy temprano para regar y brindarle el cuidado respectivo a sus cultivos. Sus productos los lleva a vender al mercado de la ciudad de Pichanaki, donde el café, cacao y plátano que cultiva, son rápidamente comprados.

Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es que puede disfrutar de la libertad de laborar en sus campos, lleva 20 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es tener que trabajar la tierra. Con el tiempo, espera poder comprar más tierras para ampliar su producción. Este es el segundo préstamo de Loida con MFP, sabe que este préstamo le ayudará bastante en el progreso y desarrollo de su negocio, es por eso que está dispuesta a pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente. En su banco comunal es una socia muy responsable, motivo por el cual es muy querida. 

Con los mil seiscientos nuevos soles solicitados los invertirá en la compra de abono e insecticidas.
texts.en:
Loida, age 41, is a very kind and hard-working woman.  She lives in her own house with her 46 year old husband, Camilo, and their beloved three children.  She wishes to give them a better quality of life.

Working arduously, Loida has managed to get ahead with her crops.  She takes her products to sell at the market in the city of Pichanaki.  The coffee, cacao, and bananas that she grows are rapidly sold at the market.

What she likes the most about her work is being able to enjoy the freedom of working in her fields.  She has been doing this for 20 years.  She considers the most difficult part to be having to work the land.  In time, she hopes to be able to buy more land to increase her production.

This is Loida’s second loan with MFP.  She knows that this loan with help her a lot in the progress and development of her business.  That is why she is prepared to make all of her payments on time.  She is a very responsible member of her communal bank.  Therefore, she is very well-liked.

She will use the 1,600 soles that she is requesting to buy fertilizer and insecticides.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and insecticides

loans.name: Luis

texts.es:
Luis tiene 49 años, es un hombre muy sencillo y trabajador, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposa Juana, de 44 años, y su querido hijo Tomas, de 14 años, quienes son el motivo principal de todos sus esfuerzos.

En la provincia de Chanchamayo se encuentran las chacras de Luis, sus tierras son amplias y con los cuidados que les brinda las ha convertido en uno de los cultivos mejores trabajados del poblado. Por ese motivo, cuando lleva a vender sus plátanos y café al mercado de la ciudad, obtiene muy buenos precios debido a la buena calidad de sus productos.
Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es sembrar sus tierras y hacerlas fértiles, lleva 10 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es cuidar sus cultivos de la plagas que pueden afectarlos. Con el tiempo, desea comprar más tierras en otros poblados para así aumentar su producción y variar sus cultivos.

Este es el segundo préstamo de Luis con MFP, sabe que tiene que pagarlo puntualmente, si quiere acceder a otro crédito en el futuro. En su banco comunal es un socio muy responsable y siempre está pendiente de los acuerdos a los que llegan en el grupo.
Con los ochocientos nuevos soles solicitados comprará más abono y fertilizantes para mejorar sus tierras.
texts.en:
Luis is 49 years old.  He is a very humble and hard-working man who lives in his own home together with his wife, 44 year-old Juana, and his beloved son Thomas who is 14.  His wife and son are the main motivation behind all his hard work.

Luis' plantations are located in Chanchamayo province.  He has a lot of land and the care that he provides for his crops has made them some of the best looked-after crops in town.  For this reason, when he takes his bananas and coffee to the city market to sell, he obtains very good prices because they are good-quality products.

What Luis most likes about his work is sowing his land and making it fertile.  He has been in this business for 10 years and he considers the most difficult part of his work to be protecting his crops from the pests that can affect them.  Over time, he would like to buy more land in other towns so that he can increase his production and vary his crops.

This is Luis' second loan with MFP.  He knows that he must make his repayments punctually if he wants to access another loan in the future.  Luis is a very responsible member of his community bank and he is always aware of the agreements that are reached in his group.  Luis will use the 800 Peruvian soles he has requested to buy more manure and fertilizers to improve his land.

loans.use: To buy manure and fertilizers

loans.name: Mario

texts.es:
Mario tiene 27 años, es un hombre muy amable y sencillo, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposa Heredia, de 22 años, y sus 2 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida.

El arduo trabajo que Mario realiza en sus chacras le ha traído como resultado una buena producción, ya que sus plantaciones de plátanos y café, han sido cosechadas abundantemente y con muy buena calidad. 
Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cosechar sus tierras, ya que siente que sus esfuerzos están dando frutos. Lleva 4 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es cuidar sus sembríos de las plagas que pueden afectarlas. Con el tiempo, espera comprar más tierras para incrementar su producción.

Este es el primer préstamo de Mario con MFP, sabe que tiene que poner todo de su parte y trabajar muy duro para pagar puntualmente sus cuotas, y está dispuesto a hacerlo. En su banco comunal es un socio muy responsable, motivo por el cual es muy respetado.
Con los seiscientos nuevos soles solicitados comprará abono e insecticidas para mejorar su producción.
texts.en:
Mario is 27 years old.  He is a very kind and modest man who lives in his own home together with his wife, 22 year-old Heredia, and his two beloved children, for whom he would like to provide a better quality of life.

The hard work that Mario does on his plantations has ensured him a good production since his banana and coffee plantations provide an abundant harvest and very good-quality produce.

What Mario most likes about his work is harvesting his land since then he feels that his efforts are bearing fruit.  He has been in this business for 4 years and he considers the most difficult part of his work to be protecting his crops from the pests that can affect them.  Over time, he hopes to buy more land to increase his production.

This is Mario's first loan with MFP.  He knows that he must put in a lot and work very hard in order to make his loan repayments on time and he is ready to do this.  He is a very responsible member of his community bank which means that he is very well respected.  He will use the 600 Peruvian soles he has requested to buy manure and insecticides to improve his production.

loans.use: To buy manure and insecticides

loans.name: Martha

texts.es:
Martha tiene 30 años, es una mujer muy humilde y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Roberto, de 37 años, y sus 5 hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida.

La actividad a la que Martha se dedica es el cultivo de plátano y café. Todos los días muy temprano por la mañana, comienza con el cuidado de sus chacras, ya que sabe que mientras más cuidadosa sea con sus cultivos, mejores productos obtendrá en el momento de la cosecha.
Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es sembrar sus tierras y lo hace con mucha paciencia, lleva 6 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus cultivos hasta el mercado de la ciudad, que es donde vende sus productos. Con el tiempo, espera comprar más tierras para aumentar sus cultivos.

Este es el segundo préstamo de Martha con MFP, sabe que tiene que ser puntual en el pago de sus cuotas si quiere acceder a otro crédito en el futuro. En su banco comunal es una socia muy responsable, motivo por el cual es muy respetada por sus compañeras.
Con los mil nuevos soles solicitados comprará más abono y fertilizantes para sus cultivos, también comprará insecticidas.
texts.en:
Martha is 30 years old.  She is a very humble and hard-working woman who lives in her own home together with her husband, 37 year-old Roberto, and her 5 children for whom she would like to provide a better quality of life.

Martha's business is growing bananas and coffee.  She gets up very early every morning and starts working on her plantations since she knows that the more care she takes of her crops, the better the produce she will obtain when she harvests.

What Martha most likes about her work is sowing her land and she does this with a lot of patience.  She has been in this business for 6 years and she considers the most difficult part of her work to be transporting her crops to the market in the city which is where she sells her products.  Over time, she hopes to buy more land and increase her crops.

This is Martha's second loan with MFP.  She knows that she must be punctual in making her repayments if she wants to access another loan in the future.  Martha is a very responsible member of her community bank and, for this reason, she is well-respected by her fellow members.  She will use the 1,000 Peruvian soles she has requested to buy more manure and fertilizers for her crops.  She will also buy insecticides.

loans.use: To buy manure and fertilizers

loans.name: Marcelino

texts.es: Marcelino, de 38 años, esta  casado con Margarita (41)  y fruto de ese amor tienen cinco  hijos, juntos habitan  una casa alquilada.Marcelino se dedica al cultivo y producción de cacao y coca, lo realiza en el centro poblado de Palmapampa. Su jornada empieza todas las mañanas a partir de las seis de la mañana  hasta las seis de la tarde; ella se desempeña en esta labor desde hace 10 años junto a su esposa. Le gusta trabajar en su propia chacra y siempre  trata de mejorar su producción, pues con sus propias manos hace que los frutos mejoren cosecha tras cosecha.  A veces le incomoda la falta de apoyo, pero no se atemoriza ante los problemas, pues  son retos que cumplir y por eso le va bien en su trabajo porque dice que  es rentable; cuando es tiempo de vender su mercadería en lo hace en el centro de acopio de su comunidad, donde le pagan un buen precio. Tiene planeado para  el futuro ampliar su negocio y mejorar su estabilidad económica, para eso menciona que comprara más tierras.Es su cuarto préstamo con MFP, y asegura seguir cumpliendo lo pagos en sus respectivas fechas, le gusta trabajar en su banco comunal porque entre ellos existe el apoyo moral y económico necesario para salir adelante.Marcelino tiene planeado invertir el dinero solicitado en  el pago de peones para el  mantenimiento de sus plantaciones, de cacao y coca, de esta manera  mejorar su estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Marcelino is 38 years old.  He is married to Margarita (41) and they have five children together.  They live in a rental house.  Marcelino works growing and producing cacao and coca in Palmapampa.  His work day begins every morning at 6.00am and he works until 6.00pm.  He has been doing this work, together with his wife, for 10 years.

Marcelino likes working on his own farm and he is always trying to improve his production.  With his own hands, he ensures that his crops improve from harvest to harvest.  Sometimes his lack of support is difficult but his problems don't intimidate him since they are challenges that must be met.  His work is going well and he says that it is profitable.  When it is time to sell his products, he does this in the storage center in his community where they pay him a good price.  Marcelino plans, in the future, to expand his business and improve his financial stability.  He mentions that he will buy more land.

This is Marcelino's fourth loan with MFP and he assures us that he will continue making his loan repayments on time.  He likes working with his community bank because there is a lot of moral and financial support amongst the members which helps them all to get ahead.  Marcelino plans to invest the money he has requested in paying laborers to maintain his cacao and coca plantations.  In this way, he will improve his financial stability.

loans.use: To pay laborers to help him maintain his crops

loans.name: Noe

texts.es:
Noe tiene 33 años, es un hombre muy sencillo y trabajador, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposa Maura, de 25 años, y sus 4 hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida.

El trabajo al que Noe se dedica es el cultivo de café y plátano, los cuales, después de la cosecha, lleva a vender a la ciudad, que es donde mejores precios obtiene por sus productos.
Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cultivar sus tierras, lleva 18 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos, ya que la ruta es muy accidentada. Con el tiempo, espera poder comprar más tierras para incrementar la cantidad que produce normalmente.

Este es el segundo préstamo de Noe con MFP, en sus primeros créditos fue muy puntual y espera serlo ahora también. En su banco comunal es un socio muy querido, ya que contagia su alegría al resto de socias.
Con los setecientos nuevos soles solicitados comprará abono para fertilizar mejor sus tierras.
texts.en:
Noe is 33 years old.  He is a very modest and hard-working man who lives in his own home together with his wife, 25 year-old Maura, and his 4 children for whom he would like to provide a better quality of life.

Noe's business is growing coffee and bananas.  After he harvests his crops, he takes them to the city to sell as this is where he obtains the best prices for his products.

What Noe most likes about his work is cultivating his land.  He has been in this business for 18 years and he considers the most difficult part of his work to be transporting his products since the route is very rough and rugged.  Over time, he hopes to buy more land to increase the quantity of crops that he produces.

This is Noe's second loan with MFP.  He was very punctual in paying back his previous loan and he hopes to continue being punctual in paying back this loan.  He is a very well-liked member of his community bank since his happiness is contagious and infects the other members.  Noe plans to spend the 700 Peruvian soles he has requested in buying manure to better fertilize his land.

loans.use: To buy manure

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
Pedro tiene 40 años, es un hombre muy amable y trabajador, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposa Marleny, de 28 años, y sus 3 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida.

Los arduos días de trabajo que tiene Pedro en su chacra, han hecho que sus cultivos de plátano y café se conviertan en uno de los más productivos de su poblado. Él trabaja sin descaso, ya que sabe que de su esfuerzo depende la alimentación de su familia.
Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cosechar sus tierras, lleva 5 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus cultivos hasta la ciudad, que es donde vende sus productos. Con el tiempo, espera comprar más tierras para aumentar su producción.

Este es el primer préstamo de Pedro con MFP, espera cumplir con todas sus cuotas a tiempo y así no perjudicar a las socias de su banco comunal, donde es muy respetado por la responsabilidad que demuestra.
Con los mil nuevos soles solicitados comprará abono y fertilizantes para mejorar la productividad de sus tierras.
texts.en:
Pedro is 40 years old.  He is a kind and hard-working man who lives in his own home together with his wife, 28 year-old Marleny, and his 3 beloved children for whom he would like to provide a better quality of life.

Pedro's hard work days on his farm have meant that his banana and coffee crops have become some of the most productive in his village.  He works without a rest since he knows that his ability to feed his family depends on his hard work.  What he most likes about his work is harvesting his land.  He has been in this business for 5 years and he considers the most difficult part of his work to be transporting his crops to the city which is where he sells them.  Over time, he hopes to buy more land so that he can increase his production.

This is Pedro's first loan with MFP.  He hopes to pay back all his loan repayments on time so that he does not jeopardize the other members of his community bank where he is well respected for his responsibility.  Pedro will use the 1,000 Peruvian soles he has requested to buy manure and fertilizers to improve the productivity of his land.

loans.use: To buy manure and fertilizers

loans.name: Sergia

texts.es:
Sergia tiene 28 años, es una mujer muy sencilla y alegre, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Ismael, de 28 años, y sus 6 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida.

Trabajando arduamente, Sergia ha logrado sacar adelante sus sembríos. Todas las mañana se levanta muy temprano para regar y brindarle el cuidado respectivo a sus plantaciones de café y plátano, los cuales, posteriormente, venderá en la ciudad, ya que es ahí donde obtiene los mejores precios por sus productos.
Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es que puede disfrutar de la libertad de laborar en sus campos, lleva 10 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es tener que trabajar la tierra. Con el tiempo, espera poder adecuar sus tierras para plantar mucho más café.

Este es el primer préstamo de Sergia con MFP, sabe que este préstamo le ayudará bastante en el progreso y desarrollo de su negocio, es por eso que está dispuesta a pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente. En su banco comunal es una socia muy responsable, motivo por el cual es muy querida.
Con los trescientos nuevos soles solicitados comprará más abono y fertilizantes para mejorar la calidad de sus tierras.
texts.en:
Sergia is 28 years old.  She is a very humble and happy woman who lives in her own home together with her husband, 28 year-old Ismael, and her 6 beloved children for whom she would like to provide a better quality of life.

Through her hard work, Sergia has managed to get ahead with her crops.  Every morning she gets up very early to water and care for her coffee and banana plantations.  She will later sell her crops in the city since that is where she obtains the best prices for her products.

What Sergia most likes about her work is that she can enjoy the freedom of working in her fields.  She has been in this business for 10 years and she considers the most difficult part of her work to be having to work her land.  Over time, she hopes to be able to prepare her land so that she can plant a lot more coffee.

This is Sergia's first loan with MFP.  She knows that this loan will help her in making progress and developing her business.  For this reason, she is prepared to make her loan repayments on time.  She is a very responsible member of her community bank, for which reason she is very well liked.  Sergia plans to use the 300 Peruvian soles she has requested to buy more manure and fertilizers in order to improve the quality of her land.

loans.use: To buy manure and fertilizers

loans.name: Silverio

texts.es:
Silverio tiene 40 años, es un hombre muy sencillo y trabajador, vive en su casa propia junto a sus 4 hijos, y lo que más desea es brindarles un mejor futuro.

El cultivo de café, plátano y palta, es la actividad a la que se dedica Silverio, todos los días desde muy temprano sale a trabajar a sus chacras, con el único fin de esforzarse mucho para que sus cultivos tengan muy buena calidad.
Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cultivar, lleva 20 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es fumigar sus tierras, ya que los químicos son muy peligrosos. Con el tiempo, espera sembrar más y así tener una mejor producción.

Este es el segundo préstamo de Silverio con MFP, sabe que tiene que pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente si quiere acceder a otro préstamo. En su banco comunal es un socio muy cumplido y activo.
Con los dos mil nuevos soles solicitados comprará más abono e insecticidas para sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Silverio is 40 years old.  He is a very humble and hard-working man who lives in his own home together with his 4 children.  What he wants more than anything is to offer them a better future.

Silverio grows coffee, bananas and avocados.  Very early every day he goes out to work on his land with the sole aim of working hard so that he produces very good-quality crops.  What he most likes about his work is cultivating his land.  He has been in this business for 20 years and he considers the most difficult part of his work to be spraying his land since the chemicals are very dangerous.  Over time, he hopes to sow more crops and thereby improve his production.

This is Silverio's second loan with MFP.  He knows that he must make his repayments punctually if he wants to access another loan.  He is a very punctual and active member of his community bank.  Silverio plans to use the 2,000 Peruvian soles he has requested to buy more manure and insecticides for his crops.

loans.use: To buy manure and insecticides

loans.name: Mujeres En Accion 4 & 5 Group

texts.en:
Ramona is a 23 year-old single mother of one child. Ramona operates a food stall where she sells breakfast and dinner.  She prepares sandwiches, juices, and grilled sausages, and also sells candies and other snacks. She will use this loan to purchase sausages, cheese, eggs, bread, fruits, candies and other food. She hopes that she can save profits to invest later in her business and begin to study English, one of her dreams.  She also  wants to meet her most difficult challenge: legalizing her status in the Dominican Republic. 

Ramona's home is in a village called a Batey, a small town surrounded by a sugar cane field. This one is located in San Pedro. Bateyes are poor rural communities built by sugar companies to house their field workers. Over time, conditions in these communities have deteriorated badly, and houses are in poor shape. Bateyes typically lack potable water and any kind of reliable electricity. They also have few medical services. 

Ramona is a member of the group, Mujeres en Accion (Women in Action), groups 4 & 5.  Most of the members of the 7 other groups in her community are Haitian immigrants or part Dominicans.  Ramona's story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican  clients, many of whom recently emigrated to the DR from Haiti.

loans.use: To buy sausages, cheese, eggs, bread, etc

loans.name: Wilmer

texts.es:
Wilmer tiene 30 años, es un hombre muy sencillo y trabajador, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposa Mari, de 26 años, y sus 4 hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida.

Desde muy joven Wilmer se dedicó al cultivo de café, plátano y cacao, ya que esta es la actividad que ha realizado su familia desde hace mucha generaciones. Sus productos los vende a los compradores que llegan hasta sus chacras, quienes posteriormente llevan el producto a vender a la ciudad de Lima.
Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cultivar sus tierras y lo hace con mucho esmero, lleva 14 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es fumigar sus sembríos. Con el tiempo, desea comprar más tierras para poder incrementar su producción.

Este es el segundo préstamo de Wilmer con MFP, sabe que tiene que pagar sus cuotas a tiempo y está dispuesto a hacerlo. En su banco comunal es muy respetuoso con el resto de sus socias.
Con los mil nuevos soles solicitados comprará más abono y fertilizantes para sus tierras.
texts.en:
Wilmer is 30 years old.  He is a very modest and hard-working man who lives in his own home together with his wife, 26 year-old Mari, and his 4 children for whom he would like to provide a better quality of life.

Wilmer has been growing coffee, bananas and cacao since he was very young.  His family has been in this business for many generations.  He sells his products to buyers who come to his farm and then take his products to the city of Lima to sell.  What Wilmer most likes about his work is cultivating his land and he does this with a lot of care.  He has been in this business for 14 years and he considers the most difficult part of his work to be spraying his crops.  Over time, he would like to buy more land so that he can increase his production.

This is Wilmer's second loan with MFP.  He knows that he must make his repayments on time and he is ready to do this.  He is a very respectful member of his community bank.  Wilmer will use the 1,000 Peruvian soles he has requested to buy more manure and fertilizers for his land.

loans.use: To buy manure and fertilizers

loans.name: Sop Caurie Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité SOP CAURIE est créé de bientôt 5 ans. Il est composé de 25 femmes qui sont toutes issues du même village. D'une manière globale elle pratique le petit commerce de fruits

Madame NDEYE ASTOU D. debout en cinquième position à partir de la gauche et mise en médaillon est responsable du groupe. Elle est âgée de 40 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 05 enfants en charge. 

Comme les autres femmes du village elle fait un petit commerce de fruits de saison. Elle maitrise bien cette activité pour l'avoir pratiquée depuis son jeune âge.

Son nouveau crédit lui permettra d'intensifier son activité en achetant plus de fruits

Son objectif est de subvenir à ses besoins personnel tout en participant à la prise en de la famille
texts.en:
The SOP CAURIE solidarity group was created almost 5 years ago. It is made up of 25 women from the same village. Overall, they run businesses selling fruit.
Ndeye Astou D., standing fifth from the left and identified in the inset portrait, is in charge of the group. She is 40 years old, married and mother to 5 dependent children.
Like the other women in the village, she sells seasonal fruit. She runs her business well, having worked at it from a young age.
This new loan will allow her to expand her business by purchasing more fruit. Her goal is to support herself and to help cover her family’s expenses.

loans.use: Purchase of fruit

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María, de 51 años, está casada con Víctor y fruto de ese gran amor tienen cuatro  hijos; juntos habitan en su casa que es propia.Desde muy joven, María se percato que el producto de coca, tenía mucha acogida en su valle, y con esa idea implantada, decidió trabajar en la chacra de sus padres, desde luego que le gustaba vivir en el campo, ya que respira armonía y paz. En la actualidad  produce y comercializa la hoja de coca a los compradores,  en temporada de cosecha necesita  de sus peones con la finalidad de que puedan cosechar las hojas de manera rápida y oportuna. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cuidar sus cultivos y lo hace con mucho esmero, ya lleva 25 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos hacia los mercados, ya que los sacos que lleva son muy pesados y la cansan mucho. Para más adelante, desea juntar  el dinero suficiente para comprar nuevas tierras y así incrementar sus  plantaciones de coca.Este es su primer crédito con MFP, por el cual se compromete a seguir pagando puntualmente sus cuotas, pues no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible el dinero que le permitirá continuar progresando.María tiene planeado invertir  el dinero solicitado en el pago de los jornaleros que le ayudaran en su próxima cosecha que se encuentra próxima.
texts.en:
María is 51 years old.  She is married to Víctor and they have four children together.  They live in their own home.

When she was very young, María realized that coca was very popular in her valley and, with this in mind, she decided to work on her parents' farm.  She liked living in the countryside since it is full of peace and harmony.

María currently produces and sells coca leaf to buyers.  At harvest time, she needs the help of laborers to harvest her leaves quickly and in a timely manner.  What María most likes about her work is caring for her crops and she does this with a lot of care.  She has been in this business for 25 years and she considers the most difficult part of her work to be transporting her products to market since the sacks are very heavy and they make her very tired.  In the future, María would like to gather together enough money to buy more land so that she can increase her coca plantations.

This is María's first loan with MFP.  She pledges to make her repayments on time since she doesn't want to let down the people who have made this money possible as it will allow her to continue making progress.  María plans to invest the money she has requested in paying laborers to help her with her upcoming harvest.

loans.use: To pay laborers to help her with her crops

loans.name: Baba

texts.fr: Baba N. sociétaire de Ngueniene  s’active dans la boulangerie. En effet, monsieur N. est le premier dans la localité de Ngueniene à se lancer dans la boulangerie traditionnelle.il a une bonne expérience dans ce domaine car l’ayant exercé pendant longtemps à kaolack. Depuis trois ans, Baba N. s’est installé dans le village de Nguéniene ou il rentabilise bien son activité car bénéficiant d’une large zone de chalandise. C’est lui qui fournit tous les villages de la communauté rurale du pain traditionnel que l’on appelle « tapalapa »
texts.en: Baba N. is a member who owns a bakery. In fact, Mr. N. is the first in the region of Ngueniene to open a traditional bakery. He has a good deal of experience in the field having practiced for a longtime in Koalack. For the past three years Baba N. has lived in the village of Ngueniene where he manages his business in a large commercial region.  He supplies all of the villages of the rural community with traditional bread called "tapalapa".

loans.use: To invest in his bakery.

loans.name: Cheikh

texts.fr: Cheikh N. societaire  est un commerçant qui habite à Nguéniene. En effet monsieur N. s’active dans la vente de piéces détachées avec comme lieu de vente les marchés hebdomadaires de Ngéniene, Sandiara, Thiadiaye, Mbafaye, Ndiaganiao... etc.
texts.en: Cheikh N. is a member who is a merchant living in Ngueniene. Mr. N. currently has a business selling spare parts in the weekly markets of Ngeniene, Sandiara, Thiadiaye, Mbafaye, Ndiaganiao, etc.

loans.use: To invest in his business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To invest in her restaurant business.

loans.name: Corregidora I Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama Corregidora 1 porque su calle lleva el mismo nombre, el cual es de un personaje de la Independencia de México y se identifican con ella, por su lucha constante y tenacidad. Esta ubicado en la ciudad de Pachuca en el estado de Hidalgo en México. El grupo está conformado por 8 integrantes.La Señora Juana D. es la presidenta del grupo. Tiene 46 años de edad, estudió hasta tercero de secundaria, es comerciante y tiene en total 1 hija. Vende jugos de diferentes frutas en su domicilio particular. La señora Juanita se da a conocer con sus cliente por su  buen trato y amabilidad,  la conocen como una excelente persona. Ella inció desde hace 1 año su negocio, nos comentan sus clientes que prepara los jugos y desayunos con mucha higiene y que gracias a su amabilidad cada dia aumentan sus clientes.Está solicitando el prestamo para adquirir materia prima para introducir comida y antojitos mexicanos. En un futuro no muy lejano desea remodelar su local para aumentar sus ventas y así poder ofrecerle una mejor calidad de vida a su hija  y  a su esposo.Sus clientes se enteraron de la elaboración de almuerzos al pasar por su domicilio ya que los exibe y pone anuncios ademas de la calidad que la distingue el lugar muy confortable y la calle muy transidada. La fotografia fue tomada en el interior del negocio  de la Presidenta del grupo Corregidora 1, se observa  la decoración del negocio y lo felices que se estan.
texts.en:
This group is called Corregidora 1 because its street has the same name, after an important figure in Mexico's Independence. They identify with him because of his constant struggle and tenacity. The group is in the city of Pachua, in Hidalgo state, Mexico. The group is made up of 8 members.
Mrs Juana D. is the group president. She is 46, and studied up to the third grade of secondary school. She is a merchant and has one daughter. She sells juices from different fruits in her home. Juanita is known by her customers for her good service and kindness; they know her as an excellent person. 

She started this business one year ago, and her customers tell us that she prepares her juices and breakfasts with a lot of hygiene, and that thanks to her kindness she has more customers every day. She is requesting  this loan to acquire basic material to start selling food and Mexican dishes. In the near future she wants to remodel her home in order to increase her sales and thus be able to offer her daughter and husband a better quality of life. Her customers find out about her food when they pass by her house, as she puts it on display and puts up signs. Her food is set apart by its quality, and her location is very comfortable. The street on which it is located is very well-trafficked. 

This photo was taken inside the business of the president of the Corregidora 1 group. One can observe the business' decor, and see how happy the group members are.

loans.use: to acquire basic materials to start selling food and Mexican dishes.

loans.name: Poderoso De Israel 1, 2 & 3 Group

texts.en:
Aida is a 34-year-old borrower from the rural batey of Romana, Dominican Republic. She is a member of the group, Poderoso D. Israel (The Powerful of Israel)1, 2, and 3; the name is an allusion to J. Christ, and her story is representative of the other borrowers in her group.

Aida lives with her three children, who are currently in school. She lives in a batey, a rural community built by sugar companies for their workers. Aida and her long-term partner and children have a difficult life – little access to electricity, no running water or medical services, and insufficient roads. Bateyes are maD. up of the homes of some of the poorest people in the Dominican Republic, not to mention the entire Western Hemisphere.

Despite these difficulties, Aida runs a business where she sells different goods, including beans which she has boiled at home.  These beans are ready to eat and customers can add their own sauces. With her loan, Aida plans to buy bags of beans, rice, and other vegetables to sell in her home.

Aida is very thankful for this loan, her second with Esperanza, and she hopes to continue her successful borrowing in the future.

loans.use: To buy beans, rice, vegetables.

loans.name: Miguel Hernán

texts.es:
Miguel Hernán A. C., tiene 35 años, vive en unión libre con su esposa, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tiene 2 hijos de diferentes edades 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. CIUDADELA LOS ANGELES se encuentra ubicada en el recinto Los Ángeles, pertenece al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla de 14 miembros se dedica a las labores agrícolas en ciclo corto de siembra de maíz. 

Miguel Hernán se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, Compra sus productos en  Ecua - Agro y vende en el mismo lugar.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz, compra de insumos y semillas. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es tener una casa propia

Le gusta hacer amigos y ser sociable.
texts.en:
Miguel Hernán A. C. is 35 years old.  He is in a common-law marriage; he and his wife live in the Ventanas canton in the Los Ríos province.  He has two children of different ages.

The members of the Ciudadela Los Ángeles Communal Bank are located in the Los Ángeles neighborhood in the Ventanas canton.  This bank has 14 members who devote themselves to growing short cycle corn.

Miguel Hernán grows corn.  He buys his products in Ecua-Agro, and he sells them at the same place.

He is requesting a loan to plant corn and to buy supplies and seeds.  The loan will help him financially so that he can get his necessities.  He faces challenges like pest infestations, diseases, and climate changes.

His dream is to have his own house.

He likes making friends and being sociable.

loans.use: To buy supplies and seeds

texts.es:
AMIGAS UNIDAS

Majella es integrante del grupo de Alcancía Comunal “AMIGAS UNIDAS” tiene ya 5 años llevando el cargo de presidenta del grupo este grupo esta conformado actualmente por 7 personas que se conocieron por medio de la presidenta que fue buscando gente honrada y cumplida para así poder crear su grupo.
Majella tiene 50 años de edad es madre casada de 1 hijo que es mayor de edad Majella tiene ya 19 años trabajando en su casa vendiendo cerveza y así  poder poder ayudar a su esposo en los gastos del hogar y tanbien a logrado construir su vivienda si Majella    tuviera un capital de trabajo lo invertiría en poner una tienda propia por el momento Majella invertirá su dinero del préstamo en aumentar la cantidad cerveza para vender.
texts.en:
AMIGAS UNIDAS [Friends United]

Majella is a member of the Amigas Unidas [Friends United] Communal Bank and has been president of the group for 5 years. This group currently has 7 members who met through the president, who was looking for honorable and reliable people to form her group.

Majella is 50 years old, married, and has an adult son. Majella has spent 19 years working out of her house selling beer, thereby being able to help her husband with the household expenses and also to manage to build their home. If Majella were to have working capital, she would invest it in opening an expanded store. For the moment, Majella will invest the money from her loan in increasing the amount of beer she has to sell.

loans.use: Purchase products

loans.name: Bugambilia Group

texts.es: Esta  fotografía fue tomada en la tienda de la Sra. Yolanda A., una integrante del grupo Bugambilia que está ubicado en el estado de Morelos en México, en la foto se ve parte de la mercancía que ella ofrece, ella se dedica a la venta de abarrotes negocio que inicio hace 30 años, solicita el préstamo para comprar mercancía y surtir su tienda, va a comprar granos como son: arroz, frijol, lenteja, etc. Sus clientes la prefieren porque tiene muy buenos precios, además de que los atiende muy bien, al momento de solicitar el préstamo se siente contenta porque va a poder ofrecer más productos a sus clientes, tiene 64 años, estudió hasta el 6º grado de primaria, es casada y tiene 7 hijos: 3 mujeres y 4 varones, quiere este crédito para hacer crecer su negocio, también espera con las ganancias poder comprar una televisión para su familia.
texts.en:
This photograph was taken at Yolanda A.’s store.  She is a member of the Bugambilia group, which is located in the state of Morelos in Mexico.  In the photo you can see part of the merchandise that she sells.  She sells groceries, and she started this business 30 years ago.

She is requesting the loan to buy merchandise and to stock her store.  She will buy grains like rice, beans, and lentils, etc.  Her customers prefer her because she has very good prices.  Also, she provides very good service.

At the time of requesting the loan she is happy because she will be able to offer her customers more products.

She is 64 years old, and she has a sixth grade education.  She is married and has seven children, three girls and four boys.  She wants this loan to make her business grow.  She also hopes to use the earnings to be able to buy a television for her family.

loans.use: To buy merchandise for her store

loans.name: Maria Mercedes

texts.es:
Maria Mercedes C. Q., tiene 30 años, es casada, vive con el esposo y con los hijos en el  cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tiene 4 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. NARCISA DE JESUS se encuentra ubicada en el recinto San Temistocles perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto de siembre de maíz y arroz.

Maria se dedica a la agricultura a la siembre de maíz y arroz, compra y vende los productos en ventanas en comercial Peña y vende en la casa o en el mercado de ventadas todos los días.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz, compra de insumos y semillas. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es tener una finca.

Le gusta cocinar.
texts.en:
Maria Mercedes C. Q. is 30 years old, married and lives with her husband and their children in the canton of Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. She has 4 children. 

The members of the V.R.C. NARCISA DE JESUS are located in the site of San Temistocles which belongs to the Cantón Ventanas, this area works in agriculture in a short cycle of planting corn and rice.

Maria works in agriculture planting corn and rice. She buys and sells products in the business town of Peña and sells from her house or in the market everyday.

She is requesting this loan to plant corn, to buy consumables and seeds. The help from this loan will help her financially to provide her necessities. She faces challenges such as plagues, sicknesses and the variety of the climate. Her dream is to have a farm. 

She likes to cook.

loans.use: To buy consumables and seeds.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.en: Daniel R. had a carnicería (a meat market and grocery store) in Juarez for 20 years. A few years ago, he had to close it down and move out of the city because it wasn’t safe there anymore. Now, he wants to open a new carnicería in El Paso, where he currently lives. “It started as a dream two years ago…I created a six year plan then. The Small Business Administration helped orient me on how to build a business here. And now I can start my business with ACCION’s support.” His business is opening on January 14th. Daniel calls it an American dream. Daniel is only 40 some years old, but says, “Some people think that an elderly person can’t improve their life; they’ve already reached their capacity. But I don’t believe that. If you have your health, you still can grow… It’s never too late to pursue what you want in life.” His goal is to grow his business earnings to $300,000 a year and for his business to be well known in the area. If things go well, he’d like to open another store. Daniel sees a need for carnicerías like his – and a lot of competition. “Here in El Paso, 80% are Hispanic. We have to support the needs of people of my race, who are Mexican… People are leaving Juarez for El Paso… There are many business people, small and large, who are coming here with Mexican brands.” Daniel is using this loan to buy store inventory like meats, fruit, vegetables, soap and things to clean clothes with – all the necessities. Daniel is reserving some of the loan as backup in case something happens. “Every business starts at zero. You have to have some reserves to start off with. The first 5-6 months is a process of building up credit…and saving money.” Daniel says this is the reason for his loan: “This money - is so I have that support, so I have that money to start off with. I would have started in any case, but I’d have less security. With this loan, I am less worried.” Daniel plans to employ one person part-time. He also supports himself and the youngest of his three sons, who is still an adolescent. Daniel gives the advice that “everything that you do and all the dreams you have in your life; you have to fight for them. A dream becomes a plan becomes a reality. You can achieve what you want, but you have to be very persistent… This country is a country of many opportunities, and I’ve learned that firsthand. There are people that want to help you, but you have to go knock on doors to find them.” For more information, you can contact Daniel at drochahe@gmail.com.

loans.use: For inventory: meats, fruit, vegetables, soap

loans.name: Verónica Yolanda

Le gusta cocinar y lavar la ropa.
texts.en:
Verónica Yolanda Q. T., age 25, is married and lives with her husband and children in the Ventanas canton, Los Rios Province. She has 2 children.

The members of the V.R.C. Narcisa de Jesus are located in the San Temistocles district, belonging to the Ventanas Canton. This region is dedicated to short-cycle agricultural labour, sowing corn and rice.

Veronica works in agriculture, sowing corn and rice. She buys and sells her products in stalls in the Peña shopping center, and sells them from her home or in the Ventadas market every day.

She is requesting this loan for planting corn and buying supplies and seeds. The support of this loan will help her economically to supply her needs. She confronts challenges such as plagues, diseases and the varied climate. Her dream is to buy a farm.

She enjoys cooking and washing clothing.

loans.use: the purchase of supplies and seeds

loans.name: Rosa Grimaneza

texts.es:
Rosa Grimaneza Q. T., tiene 23 años, es casada, vive con el esposo y con los hijos en el  cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tiene 1 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. NARCISA DE JESUS se encuentra ubicada en el recinto San Temistocles perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto de siembre de maíz y arroz.

Rosa se dedica a la agricultura a la siembre de maíz y arroz, compra y vende los productos en ventanas en comercial Peña y vende en la casa o en el mercado de ventadas todos los días.

Le gusta ver televisión.
texts.en:
Rosa Grimaneza Q. T. is 23 years old, is married and lives with her husband and children in Cantón Ventanas (an administrative division) in the Los Ríos province. She has one child.

The members of V.R.C Narcisa de Jesus are located in the San Temistocles compound belonging to Cantón Ventanas. This little window is dedicated to short-cycle agricultural work sowing maize and rice.

Rosa is dedicated to farming maize and rice. She buys and sells the products in Ventanas in commercial Peña  and sells from her house or in the Ventadas market every day.

She is requesting a loan to plant maize, purchase inputs and seeds. With the support of the loan, she would be helped economically to supply her necessities She is facing challenges such as pests and illness and weather changes. Her dream is to finish building her house. She enjoys watching TV.

loans.use: Purchase inputs and seeds.

loans.name: Robert

texts.en:
Robert R. started his remodeling business, "R. Home Repair", in order to help people improve their homes. His business includes doing basic plumbing and electricity, building additions, and making major changes to rooms. Robert strives to be known for the high quality of his craftsmanship. He had worked for other people in the construction business before he started his own company about six years ago. He prides himself on delivering excellent results to his clients.

Robert is proud that his business has not only survived, but grown. He has been hired by a few big homeowners to do remodeling in Corpus Christi, which has helped him build a positive work reputation. Robert has come up with a creative way of showing off his services – he gives his customers a DVD so they are able to see his previous projects. He says, “I show them the before, the middle, and the after,” which makes him stand out from other contractors.

Robert first found out about ACCION Texas-Louisiana from a banker. He is using his loan to buy tools and to upgrade his truck. He describes himself as very detail-oriented. Robert is willing to tell clients how to do the remodeling themselves. He finds that they appreciate his forthrightness, and usually end up preferring to have a professional with experience do the remodeling.  

Robert’s advice for other entrepreneurs is to just keep striving. He says that there are people who will try to pull you down, so you have to push every day for what you believe in.

loans.use: To buy tools and to upgrade his truck

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es:
Carlos Q. M., tiene 58 años, es casado, vive con la esposa y con los hijos en el  Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tiene 3 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. NARCISA DE JESUS se encuentra ubicada en el recinto San Temistocles perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto de siembre de maíz y arroz.

Le gusta ver televisión.
texts.en:
Carlos Q. M., age 58, is married. He lives with his wife and their children in Ventanas Canton, Los Ríos Province. He has 3 children.

The members of the Narcisa de Jesus Rural Bank are located in the vicinity of San Temistocles, a part of Ventanas Canton. This rural bank is dedicated to agricultural work in the short cycles of planting corn and rice.

Carlos is engaged in farming and plants corn and rice. He buys supplies and sells crops in Ventanas and the market in Peña. He sells out of his house or the Ventanas market every day.

He is applying for the loan so that he can plant corn by purchasing raw materials and seed. The loan will help him economically by supplying his necessities. He confronts challenges such as pests and diseases and variations in climate. His dream is to buy a farm. He likes to watch television.

loans.use: The purchase of raw materials and seed.

loans.name: Las Palomasas De Pachuca Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama Las Palomasas de Pachuca  porque las integrantes se identifican mucho con las aves dado que para ellas no existen ataduras, y Pachuca es una ciudad  que les agrada mucho por la tranquilidad con la que se viven en ésta mágica ciudad del estado de Hidalgo en México. El grupo está conformado por 10 integrantes.La Señora Adriana V. es la presidenta del grupo. Tiene 56 años de edad, concluyó una carrera comercial,  es casada, tiene 2 hijos: una ñiña de 14 años y un varón de 9 años. Ella es comerciante de calzado por catálogo y cosméticos, realiza venta ambulante a sus amistades y vecinos de su colonia, comenta la señora Adriana como todos sus clientes la conocen porque siempre trae consigo sus catálogos y la recomiendan, ella empezó primero a vender cosméticos pero al darse cuenta de la necesidad de sus clientes comenzo a vender calzado de dama, caballeros y niños desde hace 4 años, está solicitando el prestamo para comprar catálogos y surtir sus pedidos. Desea poner un local como distribuidora directa y poder ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos. La fotografia fue tomada en el interior de la casa de la Presidenta del grupo las Palomasas de Pachuca Sra Adriana V. quien amablemente prestó su domicilio.
texts.en: This group is named Las Palomasas (doves) de Pachuca since the members identify a lot with the birds since, for them, there are no tethers and Pachuca is a city that is liked a lot for its tranquility with which they live in this magical city in the state of Hidalgo in Mexico. The group is made up of 10 members. Adriana V. is the president of the group. She is 56 years old. She finished a business career. She is married, has two children: a 14 year old girl and a 9 year old boy. She sells shoes through a catalog and cosmetics. She sells on foot to her friends and neighbors in her area. It is noted that Adriana is known by her customers because she always brings her catalogs with her and make recommendations. She began first by selling cosmetics but after realizing the needs of her customers she began to sell women's, men's and children's shoes four years ago. She is requesting a loan to purchase catalogs and supply her orders. She wishes to start a shop as a direct distributor and be able to offer a better quality of life to her children. The photograph was taken in the interior of the house of the president of Las Palomasas de Pachuca group, Adriana V., who amiably lent her house.

loans.use: Purchase catalogs and supply orders.

Luz is dedicated to farming maize and rice. She buys and sells products in Ventanas in commercial Peña and sells from her house or in the market every day.

She is requesting a loan to plant maize. She will buy inputs and seeds. With the support of the loan, she would be helped economically by supplying her necessities. She faces challenges like pests, illness and weather changes. Her dream is to have a house and a car. She likes to cook.
