loans.name: Mary

texts.es: Mary, de 43 años, vive con su esposo  Julian (38); y sus tres  hijos, juntos habitan una casa alquilada ubicada en San Francisco.Mary  es una persona muy querida por su comunidad porque siempre les muestra afecto, es por eso que tiene su propia clientela en su librería sin preocuparle la competencia. Ella con mucho entusiasmo brinda atención de lunes a sábado dándose tiempo para tomar sus alimentos en familia sin ser interrumpida por nadie. Sus hijos están estudiando pero cuenta con su apoyo cuando lo requiere. Lleva tres años en este negocio y aprendió que la perseverancia y el optimismo es un paso para lograr sus metas, aún más contando con su familia dándole ánimo en cada momento; aunque a veces tenga que pasar momentos dificultosos al realizar sus cobranzas. A pesar de pequeños inconvenientes que se le presentan, sobresale con su negocio y con los ingresos  de su esposo, para el futuro tiene planeado comprar su propio transporte para el traslado de su mercadería.Este es el sexto crédito con MFP y le gusta realizar sus pagos puntualmente y no perjudicar a su banco comunal.Con los tres mil nuevos soles solicitados, adquirirá más mercadería  para su librería, de esta manera espera continuar progresando.
texts.en:
Mary, 43, lives with her husband, Julian (38) and their three children.  They live together in a rented house located in San Francisco.  Mary is a very beloved person in her community because she shows warmth to everyone.  For this reason, she has her own clientele for her bookstore and does not have to worry about the competition.  She tends to her store with great enthusiasm from Monday to Saturday, taking time out to take meals with her family without being interrupted by anyone.

Her children are in school but count on having her support when they need it.  She has been running her business for three years and has learned that perseverance and optimism go a long way towards achieving your goals.  She has also learned the importance of having your family around to lift your spirits at any moment, although she has still been through difficult times.  Despite the small inconveniences she has faced in her business, she has overcome them.  In the future, she plans to use her and her husband's income to buy her own vehicle for transporting her merchandise

This is her sixth loan through MFP and she likes to make her repayments punctually so that she does not harm her communal bank.  She will use the 3,000 nuevos soles that she is requesting to acquire more merchandise for her bookstore so that she can continue making progress.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock her bookstore

loans.name: Campanita I Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama Campanita 1 porque a las integrantes del grupo les gusta el personaje de Campanita. El grupo se encuentra en el Estado de Hidalgo, en México. Está conformado por nueve integrantes, mujeres emprendedoras con un negocio y/o actividad establecida que es de su agrado y ayuda a la solvencia y gastos de su familia. La señora María del Pilar es la presidenta del grupo. Ella tiene 46 años de edad, estudió hasta el tercer grado de secundaria y tiene un hijo varón. Ella se dedica venta de antojitos mexicanos como: sopes, quesadillas, tamales y bebidas calientes. Por el tiempo y la experiencia que ya tiene con la venta de comida, la mayoría de sus clientes la conoce y la identifica como una persona amable, responsable y siempre atenta. La señora María del Pilar lleva cerca de 20 años  en la venta de comida y ya cuenta con más personas que le ayudan con esta actividad, de tal manera que sus clientes quedan conformes con la rapidez y variedad de comida que ofrece.Quiere este crédito para la compra de materia prima y compra de mesas y sillas para que sus clientes estén más cómodos. La foto fue tomada en el local de la señora Norma Elodia quien ofreció su negocio para la reunión del grupo. En la foto se observa una armonía y un ambiente agradable que muestra el compañerismo y la unión que hay entre cada una de las integrantes del grupo comunal.
texts.en:
This group is called Campanita 1 ["Tinkerbell 1"] because the members like the Tinkerbell character. The group is located in the Hidalgo state, in Mexico. It is made up of nine members, enterprising women with a business and/or an established job that they enjoy, and that helps them with their finances and household costs. 

Mrs Maria del Pilar is the group president. She is 46, and studied up to the third grade of secondary school. She has one son. She sells Mexican food such as: soups, quesadillas, tamales and hot drinks. Because of her experience and the length of time that she has spent selling food, the majority of her customers know and identify her as a likable, responsible person who is always considerate. Mrs Maria del Pilar has sold food for nearly 20 years. She has people to help her with this work, and so her customers are satisfied with the speed and variety of food that she offers.

She would like this loan for the purchase of basic material, and for buying tables and chairs for her customers to be more comfortable. This photo was taken in the business of Mrs Norma Elodia, who offered up her location for the group meeting. In the photo one can observe the harmony and pleasant environment, which demonstrates the camaraderie and unity between each member of this community bank.

loans.use: the purchase of basic materials, tables and chairs

loans.name: Raymunda

texts.es: Raymunda, de 46 años, vive con su esposo  Guillermo (46) y sus seis hijos, juntos habitan  en su casa que es propia.Hace un buen tiempo atrás, Raymunda trabajaba para un productor de café, por lo cual recibía una remuneración justa, pero sus ideas no eran tomadas en cuenta. Luego de unos años incursionó en la actividad agrícola, específicamente en la producción y comercialización de café, coca y cacao, y de esta manera pueda tomar sus propias decisiones, desde luego que le esta dando buenos resultados. Además su cartera de clientes aumentó y por consiguiente sus ingresos económicos se mantienen estables.  Esto se debe al constante trabajo que realiza junto con su pareja y al apoyo de sus peones. Usualmente su producto de cacao, coca y café; los vende a los comerciantes; además  labora de lunes a sábado, a partir de las siete  de la mañana hasta las seis  de la tarde. Su plan a futuro es seguir apostando en la actividad agrícola, y  quiere comprar más terrenos de cultivo con el propósito de aumentar su producción agrícola.Este es su primer  crédito con MFP, por el cual se compromete a seguir cumpliendo con sus obligaciones de pagos, además se siente fortalecido con su banco comunal, ya que sus integrantes le   brindan muchos beneficios.Raymunda tiene planeado invertir el dinero solicitado  en el mantenimiento de sus productos agrícolas, con la compra de abono y fertilizantes, de esta manera espera seguir progresando.
texts.en: Raymunda, who is 46 years old, lives with her husband Guillermo (46) and their 6 children, together in their own house. A long time ago, Raymunda worked for a coffee grower, and received a good wage, but her ideas were not taken into account. After some years she ventured into agricultural activities, specifically the production and marketing of coffee, coca and cocoa. This allows her to make her own decisions, and since then she has had good results. In addition, her customer base is growing, and consequently her income is stable. This is due to her constant work, along with her partner, and the support of their workers. Usually she sells her cocoa, coffee and coca to merchants. She works Monday to Saturday, from 7 in the morning to 6 in the evening. Her plan for the future is to continue betting on agriculture, and she wants to buy more farmland with the intent of increasing her agricultural production. This is her first loan with MFP, and she pledges to meet her repayment obligations. She feels empowered by her communal bank, since its members have given her a lot of help. Raymunda plans to invest the requested money in maintaining her farm products with the purchase of manure and fertilizers, and in this way she hopes to continue her progress.

loans.use: Purchase manure and fertilizers to improve her crops

loans.name: Maria Luz

Los miembros de la V.R.C. NARCISA DE JESUS se encuentra ubicada en el recinto San Temistocles perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto de siembre de maíz y arroz.

Maria se dedica a la agricultura a la siembre de maíz y arroz, compra y vende los productos en ventanas en comercial Peña y vende en la casa o en el mercado de ventadas todos los días.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz, compra de insumos y semillas. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar un solar.

Le gusta cocinar los platos típicos.
texts.en:
Maria Luz P. G., age 32 años, is single. She lives with her children in the Ventanas Canton, Los Rios province. She has 3 children.

The members of the V.R.C. Narcisa de Jesus are located in the San Temistocles region, belonging to the Ventanas Canton. This region is dedicated to short-cycle agricultural labour, sowing corn and rice.

Maria works in agriculture, sowing corn and rice. She buys and sells her products in stalls in the Peña shopping center and also sells them at home or in the market every day.

She is requesting this loan for sowing corn and buying supplies and seeds. The support of this loan will help her economically to supply her needs. She confronts challenges such as plagues, diseases and the varied climate. Her dream is to buy a plot of land.
She enjoys cooking traditional dishes.

loans.use: the purchase of supplies and seeds

loans.name: Maria Cleofe

texts.es:
Maria Cleofe G. J., tiene 54 años, es viuda, vive con los hijos en el  Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tiene 2  hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. NARCISA DE JESUS se encuentra ubicada en el recinto San Temistocles perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto de siembre de maíz y arroz.

Maria  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembre de maíz y arroz, compra y vende los productos en ventanas en comercial Peña y vende en la casa o en el mercado de ventadas todos los días.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz, compra de insumos y semillas. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar una desgranadora y un carro.

Le gusta cocinar.

The members of the V.R.C. Narcisa de Jesus are located in the San Temistocles region, belonging to the Ventanas Canton. This region is dedicated to short-cycle agricultural labour, sowing corn and rice.

Maria works in agriculture, sowing corn and rice. She buys and sells her products in stalls in the Peña shopping center and also sells them at home or in the market every day.

She is requesting this loan for sowing corn and buying supplies and seeds. The support of this loan will help her economically to supply her needs. She confronts challenges such as plagues, diseases and the varied climate. Her dream is to buy a sheller and a car.
She enjoys cooking.

loans.use: the purchase of supplies and seeds

Le gusta jugar futbol.

The members of the V.R.C. Narcisa de Jesus are located in the San Temistocles region, belonging to the Ventanas Canton. This region is dedicated to short-cycle agricultural labour, sowing corn and rice.

He enjoys playing soccer.

loans.use: the purchase of supplies and seeds

Manuel C. Q., tiene 32 años, vive en Unión Libre, vive con la conviviente y con los hijos en el  Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tiene 4  hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. NARCISA DE JESUS se encuentra ubicada en el recinto San Temistocles perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto de siembre de maíz y arroz.

Manuel  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembre de maíz y arroz, compra y vende los productos en ventanas en comercial Peña y vende en la casa o en el mercado de ventadas todos los días.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz, compra de insumos y semillas. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es tener una finca.

Le gusta cocinar.
texts.en:
Manuel C. Q., age 32, is in a common-law marriage and lives with his partner and children in the Ventanas Canton, Los Rios province. He has 4 children.

The members of the V.R.C. Narcisa de Jesus are located in the San Temistocles region, belonging to the Ventanas Canton. This region is dedicated to short-cycle agricultural labour, sowing corn and rice.

Manuel works in agriculture, sowing corn and rice. He buys and sells his products in stalls in the Peña shopping center and also sells them at home or in the market every day.

He is requesting this loan for sowing corn and buying supplies and seeds. The support of this loan will help him economically to supply his needs. He confronts challenges such as plagues, diseases and the varied climate. His dream is to have a farm.
He enjoys cooking.

loans.use: the purchase of supplies and seeds

loans.name: Benito

texts.es: El Sr. Benito trabaja como chofer con vehículo propio hace ya ocho años siendo fundador de la línea de transporte donde actualmente el trabaja, solicita el crédito para la compra de mercadería ya que el colegio donde trabaja su esposa como empleada le autorizo la apertura de una tienda, solicita el crédito para la compra de refrescos, dulces galletas para surtir su tienda, su familia actualmente esta compuesta por su persona, su esposa y sus dos hijos que se encuentran en edad escolar, el sr. Benito es una persona trabajadora y responsable, esta agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Sr. Benito has operated a taxi business for eight years.  He owns his own car and started the business himself.  He is applying for a loan to buy merchandise for a retail business that he wants to start at a local school.  His wife works at the school and he now has approval to open a store there.  He wants to buy soft drinks and snacks to stock the store.  Sr. Benito is married and has two school-aged children.  He is a hard-working, responsible man, grateful for the help that he's received from the institution.

loans.use: Buy merchandise for new retail business.

loans.name: Ruth

texts.es: Ruth Q., de 38 años, es una mujer muy trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Nelson (48)  y sus dos jóvenes hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida.Todos los días Ruth abre su tienda  desde las 5 de la mañana y comienza a vender sus variados productos, su negocio es muy concurrido en el poblado de Kimbiri, ya que es una vendedora muy persuasiva y siempre convence a sus clientes de comprar más de lo habitual. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es conversar con sus clientes, así aprovecha para distraerse un poco, ya lleva 7 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es tener que permanecer todo el día en su tienda en espera de clientes, sin poder salir muy seguido. Para el futuro, espera juntar más dinero para adquirir más mercadería donde pueda brindar a sus clientes variados tipos de productos.Este es el sexto préstamo de Ruth con MFP, sabe que tiene que cumplir con los pagos de todas sus cuotas a tiempo, y en su banco comunal es una socia muy alegre y solidaria.Con los mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más productos para implementar mejor su negocio, y de esta manera espera ofrecer lo mejor a sus clientes.
texts.en: Ruth Q., 38, is a hard-working woman.  She lives in a house that she owns with her husband, Nelson (48), and their two young children for whom she wants to provide a better quality of life.  Ruth opens the store, in the little town of Kimbiri, every day at 5:00am to sell her merchandise.  Business is brisk because she is a very persuasive saleswoman and often convinces her customers to buy more than they came in for.  What she most enjoys about the business is talking to her customers, something that she makes the most of to entertain them a bit.  Ruth has operated the business for 7 years and she thinks the most difficult thing about it is having to always be in the store, waiting for customers, without being able to go out for long.  In the future, she hopes to save enough money to buy more merchandise so that she can provide her customers with a wider range of merchandise.  This is Ruth's sixth MFP loan and she understands that she has to repay the loan in the agreed-upon increments.  She is a popular member of her community bank.  She will use the one-thousand new soles loan to buy products to stock her business so that she can provide a better service to her customers.

loans.use: Buy merchandise to stock grocery business.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es:
Miguel Angel C. G., tiene 42 años, vive en Unión Libre, vive con el conviviente y con los hijos en el  Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tiene 7  hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. NARCISA DE JESUS se encuentra ubicada en el recinto San Temistocles perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto de siembre de maíz y arroz.

Miguel se dedica a la agricultura a la siembre de maíz y arroz, compra y vende los productos en ventanas en comercial Peña y vende en la casa o en el mercado de ventadas todos los días.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz, compra de insumos y semillas. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar terreno.

Le gusta ver televisión.
texts.en:
Miguel Angel C. G., age 42, is in a common-law marriage and lives with his partner and children in the Ventanas Canton, Los Rios province. He has 7 children.

The members of the V.R.C. Narcisa de Jesus are located in the San Temistocles region, belonging to the Ventanas Canton. This region is dedicated to short-cycle agricultural labour, sowing corn and rice.

Miguel works in agriculture, sowing corn and rice. He buys and sells his products in stalls in the Peña shopping center and also sells them at home or in the market every day.

He is requesting this loan for sowing corn and buying supplies and seeds. The support of this loan will help him economically to supply his needs. He confronts challenges such as plagues, diseases and the varied climate. His dream is to purchase a plot of land.
He enjoys watching television.

loans.use: the purchase of supplies and seeds

loans.name: Carmen

texts.en:
Carmen owns a Colmado.  This is a shop where she sells such commodities as colored candles, bread, chips, sweets, cherries, gum, spices, matches, and chocolate cake by the slice, and other goods like rice, beans, oil, sugar flour, etc. A friend told her about microfinance, and how she could get a loan to invest in her business.  Carmen got her first loan to buy more goods and improve her inventory. Now, after 7 years as an Esperanza client, she is receiving her 9th loan. She is married and has five older children.

This Esperanza associate is an example of the dedication and effort that is possible to progress and improve oneself, her family and others. Her story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican clients (many of whom recently emigrated to the DR from Haiti).  The rural area surrounding Hato Mayor, is an agricultural area. This area, like nearly all impoverished areas of the Dominican Republic, suffers from unreliable electricity and running water (none of which is potable).

loans.use: To buy rice, beans, oil, sugar, flour, etc.

loans.name: Maria Francisca

texts.es: La Sra. María se dedica al comercio de abarrotes en un pasaje centrico de la ciudad de Quillacollo, atiende todos los días desde muy temprano, le colabora en la venta de abarrotes su hija durante sus vacaciones su familia esta compuesta por su esposo quien trabaja como empleado en la fabrica de refrescos, sus hijos de diez y seis años y su hija de doce años, la señora a demostrado puntualidad en el pago de su anterior crédito, solicita el crédito como capital de trabajo para compra de mercadería por las fiestas de fin de año ya que  desea comprar abarrotes, como fideos, azúcar, aceite, etc. Es una persona muy trabajadora y esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Sra. Maria operates a grocery business in a centrally-located area of the city of Quillacollo.  She works at the store every day, from very early in the morning.  Her daughter helps her with the business during her vacations.  Maria's husband works for a soft drinks manufacturer and they have two boys, ten- and six-years old, and a daughter, twelve-years old.  Maria has a history of repaying past loans on time.  She is applying for a loan to collect working capital for her business.  She wants to buy grocery products such as pasta, sugar, cooking oil, etc.  Maria is a hard-working person and grateful for the help that she's received from the institution.

loans.use: Working capital for grocery business.

loans.name: Susan

texts.es: Susan, de 29; convive con su pareja Octavio con el que tiene un hijo y están viviendo en su casa que es propia.Le gusta levantarse muy temprano para compartir su tiempo con la cocina y la venta de ropa. Desde  10 años trabaja como cocinera y vendedora de prendas de vestir.  Susan está contenta con su labor, y sobre todo le gusta preparar variedad de exquisitos platos y comercializar novedosas prendas de vestir,  que son de agrado para sus clientes, y de ese modo sus clientes optan por lo que ofrece. En la temporada de verano no le gusta mucho caminar; porque se sofoca demasiado con el calor de la ceja de selva peruana, por eso prefiere ofrecer la ropa  a partir de las cuatro  de la tarde, y de ese modo no pierde a sus clientes. Su mayor aspiración es tener otro ingreso para poder brindar un bienestar mejor a mi familia.Este es su tercer crédito que tiene con MFP y se compromete una vez más a pagar en las fechas exactas, ya que su banco comunal extiende el apoyo cuando se necesita.Con los tres mil nuevos soles solicitados, invertirá en la compra de un motocarro  y así desea obtener otro ingreso más para  su hogar; además comprara algunas prendas pues tiene algunos pedidos por cumplir.
texts.en: Susan, 29, lives with her partner, Octavio, and their son in a house that they own.  She likes to get up early so that she can work at her two jobs, as a cook and as the operator of a clothing business.  She has worked at both for 10 years.  She is happy with the work, cooking delicious food, on one hand, and selling original and unique items of clothing, on the other.  Her customers appreciate what she has to offer and come to her for what they need.  In the summer, the heat in the Peruvian jungle is suffocating so Susan's customers avoid going out when they can.  Consequently, she generally works selling clothes after 4:00pm so that she doesn't miss anyone.  Her greatest wish is to have another source of income so that she can better provide for her family.  This is her third MFP loan and she is committed to repaying it on the agreed-upon dates because the community bank provides much-needed financing.  With the three-thousand new soles loan, she will buy a motorized cart, an investment that will help her increase her family's income.  She will also buy items of clothing to fill existing orders.

loans.use: Buy a motorized cart and merchandise for clothing sales business.

loans.name: Teofila

texts.es: Teofila, de 31 años, es una mujer muy trabajadora, vive en su casa propia en Kimbiri junto a su conviviente Alberto (37)  y lo que más desea es sacar adelante a sus dos pequeños  hijos.El lugar más conocido para comprar ropa en el pueblo de  Kimbiri (Ayacucho), es sin lugar a dudas la tienda de  Teofila. En este lugar atiende a todos sus clientes con mucha amabilidad y cortesía, quienes visitan continuamente su puesto, debido a los novedosos modelos de ropa que trae personalmente de la ciudad. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es aconsejar a sus clientas sobre las prendas que mejor les quedan, ya que de esta manera se distrae un poco, lleva ocho años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es tener que permanecer todo el día en su puesto de venta, ya que abre a las cinco  de la mañana y trabaja hasta aproximadamente las diez  de la noche. Con el tiempo, desea instalar una tienda más grande, en la cual pueda brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes.Este es su segunda prestación de Teófila con MFP, sabe que tiene que pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente si quiere acceder a otro crédito en el futuro y esta dispuesta a hacerlo. En su banco comunal es un socia, muy alegre y siempre esta poniendo el buen humor en las reuniones.Con los dos mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más mercadería en prendas de vestir que traerá de Lima, de preferencia ropa de verano, ya que este tipo de ropa es la que más se vende en esta parte de la selva peruana, y espera continuar adelante.
texts.en: Teofila, 31, is a hard-working woman.  She lives with her partner, Alberto (37), in a house that they own in the town of Kimbiri.  They have two young children and what Teofila most wants in the world is to make a better life for them.  Teofila's store in Kimbiri (Ayacucho) is far and away the best-known place to buy clothing.  She is a friendly, courteous woman who tends to the constant stream of customers who come to her shop looking for the unique items of clothing that she brings from the city.  What she most likes about the business is helping her customers find the articles of clothing that best suits them.  She has operated the business for eight years and says that the most difficult thing about it is having to tend the shop all days because she starts at 5:00am and works until about 10:00pm.  In the future, she would like to have a larger store so that she can provide even better service to her customers.  This is Teofila's second MFP loan and she knows that she has to repay it in the agreed-upon time if she wants to receive future loans, something that she'd like to do.  She is a popular member of her community bank, always full of good cheer at bank meetings.  She will use the two-thousand new soles loan to buy clothing that she will bring from Lima--preferably summer clothing because that's what her customers demand in this steamy part of Peru--so that she can continue to grow her business.

loans.use: Buy merchandise for clothing business.

loans.name: Gladis Maribel

texts.es: La señora Gladis dedicada a la venta D. productos D. primera necesidad y también se dedica a la venta D. y otros productos a pedido del cliente ella entrega sus productos a crédito y va cobrando semanalmente o quincenal, la señora es  una mujer emprendedora entre las muchas que salen adelante solas por esfuerzos propios. La señora  sale a trabajar por las mañanas y por las tardes y al medio día vuelve a casa para poder cocinar para sus pequeños. Este crédito que solicita la señora es para poder aumentar su capital comprar abarrotes, como fideos, azúcar, aceite, etc. Es una persona muy trabajadora y esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Gladis' business is selling essential household products.  She also sells other products to order.  She delivers her products to her customers on credit and collects payment every week or fortnight.  Gladis is an enterprising woman, like many others, who gets ahead on her own, through her own efforts.

Gladis goes out to work in the mornings and afternoons and at midday she returns home so that she can cook for her little ones.  She is requesting this loan so that she can increase her capital, buying groceries such as noodles, sugar, oil, etc.  She is a very hard-working person and is grateful to the institution for the support they have offered her.

loans.use: Working capital for her groceries business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To expand her business by purchasing clothes

loans.name: Norma Elizabeth

texts.es:
Noma de 29 años, es una mujer trabajadora que comenzó a vender productos de uso personal a sus amigos y conocidos en una zona urbana llamada Orquídeas.

Por la falta de oportunidades y la imagen que ella tenía para mantener a sus dos hijos ya que es madre soltera ha estado trabajando durante años vendiendo cremas, perfumes y cosméticos a un bajo costo.  Por lo que quiere mantener a sus hijos bien y que sigan estudiando en la escuela fisca. Necesita seguir trabajando para generar dinero por eso quiere el préstamo para compra ropa y perfumes y asi surtir su negocio. 

En el futuro quiere tener un local fijo para vender su mercadería y tener tiempo para sus hijos.
texts.en:
Noma is 29 years old.  She is a hard-working woman who sells personal products to her friends and acquaintances in an urban area called Orquídeas.

Owing to a lack of opportunities and the need to support her two children since she is a single mother, Norma has been working for years selling creams, perfumes and cosmetics at a low price.  She would like to support her children well and she would like them to continue studying in school.  Norma needs to continue working to make money.  For this reason, she needs a loan to buy clothes and perfume with which she can stock her business.

In the future, Norma would like to have fixed premises where she could sell her merchandise and have time for her children.

loans.use: To buy clothes and perfume

loans.name: Juana

texts.en:
Juana is one of our associates from the Hato Mayor branch, a rural town whose economy depends on agriculture. She is a merchant, selling fruits and vegetables.  She runs a stall where people can buy plantains, salad, bananas, potatoes, different fruits and many others goods of this kind. She is a widow and mother of six. Juana tells us that the most difficult part has been to get established economically. She wants her business to keep growing.  

Juana is very excited to be receiving her 7th loan from Esperanza Internacional. She has been working for her business about 12 years. She is very thankful to have received loans from Esperanza because she has improved her business.  She plans to save the profit and to build her house after God blesses her savings.

loans.use: To buy casaba, plantains, bananas, potatoes, fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Celia

texts.es: La señora Celia nacida el 5 de febrero en Santa Cruz casada con el Sr.  Santo con 4 hijos. Vive en limoncito y trabaja en la agricultura en la Paliza a 45 km de San Luis donde tiene su parcela, toda la familia trabaja en la agricultura, viven y trabajan en la misma  parcela, son una familia muy unida que se dedican a la siembra de maíz, yuca, el diento del crédito lo utilizaran  en la compra de semillas para la siembra de maíz y en el preparado de la tierra, una ves que cosechan sus productos, lo comercializan en el mercado de el tormo, la Sra. Celia esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Celia was born on February 5th in Santa Cruz.  She is married to Santo and has four children.  She lives in Limoncito and works as a farmer in La Paliza, 45 km from San Luis, where she has her plot of land.  All Celia's family work in farming.  They live and work on the same plot of land.  They are a very close family who grow corn and cassava.  The loan money will be used to buy seeds for growing corn and in preparing Celia's land.  Once her products are harvested, they are sold in El Tormo market.  Celia is grateful to the institution for the support they have offered her.

loans.use: To buy seeds for growing corn

loans.name: Maria Paulina

texts.es:
Maria es una padre de familia de 52 años de edad que reside junto a su esposo y sus hijo de 13 años de edad en el distrito de Paiján, una zona agrícola que pertenece a la provincia de Ascope y que se encuentra situada en la región La Libertad, a más de dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Maria cuenta con un establecimiento instalado en su domicilio, allí ofrece en venta diversos productos como: abarrotes, golosinas y bebidas de todo tipo.  Ella atiende a sus clientes siempre con un trato amable y servicial. Su negocio cuenta actualmente con un grupo de clientes fieles que siempre recurren a su establecimiento para agenciarse de los productos que ofrece. Los ingresos que percibe de esta actividad le sirven para ayudar a su familia a salir adelante y progresar.

Maria desea surtir su negocio adquiriendo más productos para vender en su bodega, de modo que pueda satisfacer la demanda con la que actualmente cuenta, así también desea  aumentar sus ventas y percibir mayores ingresos que le permitan progresar. Para lograr su objetivo se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Maria is a 52 year-old mother who lives together with her husband and 13 year-old son in Paiján district.  This is an agricultural area in Ascope province, in La Libertad region, more than two hours from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of Lambayeque region.

Maria has an establishment in her home where she sells a variety of products such as: groceries, candy and all kinds of drinks.  She always serves her customers in a kind and obliging manner.  Her business currently has a group of loyal customers who always come to her establishment to buy the products that she offers.  Maria uses the income that she makes from her business to help her family get ahead and make progress.

Maria would like to stock her business, acquiring more products to sell in her store so that she can meet the demand that she currently has.  She also wants to increase her sales and make more profits which will allow her to make progress.  In order to achieve her goal, she has decided to request a loan for 1,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: To acquire more products to sell in her grocery store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a truck for his business

loans.name: Videlmina

texts.es: Videlmina, de 40 años, vive con su pareja Francisco, y sus pequeños hijos en su casa que es propia.Desde hace dos  años, por circunstancias de la vida, ella empezó a dedicarse a la venta de abarrotes, a  inicios su bodega era muy precaria; no tenía mostradores ni vitrinas, por ello decidieron unir los ingresos de su  esposo con las ganancias de la bodega, con la finalidad de mejorar su calidad de vida. De esta manera han ido invirtiendo de a pocos para terminar con los acabados respectivos de su casa, además han logrado comprar vitrinas para  su negocio. A ella le gusta dedicarse al comercio, asimismo le gusta dedicarse a las labores  del hogar. Lo que anhela en la vida es que sus hijos sean profesionales por ello trabajara con mucha dedicación  hasta lograrlo.Este es su tercer préstamo que tiene con MFP, y será muy responsable como siempre, además está conforme con el trabajo de su banco comunal porque todos los integrantes son personas responsables.Tiene planeado invertir el dinero solicitado en la compra de  mayor cantidad de abarrotes en general para tener en su almacén y de ese modo su negocio sea más atractivo.
texts.en:
Videlmina is 40 years old.  She lives with her partner Francisco and her young children in her own home.  Two years ago, through circumstance, she started selling groceries.  At first her grocery store was very unstable.  She didn't have any counters or display cases.  For this reason, she decided to put together her husband's income and the profits from her store in order to improve her quality of life.  In this way, the couple have been gradually investing in finishing some work on their home and they have also managed to buy some display cases for her business.

Videlmina likes to work in sales.  She also likes to do her household chores.  What she longs for in life is for her children to become professionals and she will work with a lot of commitment to achieve that.

This is Videlmina's third loan with MFP and she will be very responsible as ever.  She is happy with the work her community bank does because all the members are responsible people.  She plans to invest the money she has requested in buying a larger quantity of general groceries for her store.  This will make her business more attractive.

loans.use: To buy merchandise to stock her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To make improvements to her home

loans.name: Violeta

texts.es: Violeta, de 60 años, es una mujer muy amable y sencilla, vive en una casa alquilada junto a su esposo Alejandro (62) y tienen cinco  hijos mayores que ya viven independientemente.El negocio de venta de gaseosas y cervezas de esta trabajadora mujer es uno de los más concurridos en el poblado de San Francisco, el gran carisma que posee y la amabilidad en su trato, han hecho que sea la preferida por sus vecinos, quienes no dudan en realizar sus compras en su centro de atención, ya que saben que es un negocio que esta a la disposición de sus clientes. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es conversar con sus clientes de los  problemas que les atormentan y así puede aconsejarles, ya  lleva 2 años en esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es soportar algunos ebrios  que tratan de sobrepasarse con la confianza de las ventas,  pero siempre los pone en su lugar. Muchos días tiene que atender de corrido, si no quiere que sus ventas bajen, y para  más adelante, espera que su negocio crezca y se convierta en el más frecuentado de su pueblo.Este el segundo préstamo de Violeta con MFP, sabe que si lo paga a tiempo, podrá acceder a otro con mayor tranquilidad y sin traerle complicaciones a su banco comunal.Con los dos mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará dulces y mostradores pequeños  para incorporar a su negocio, de esta manera espera que su negocio siga creciendo.
texts.en:
Violeta is 60 years old.  She is a very kind and humble woman who lives in a rental house together with her husband, 62 year-old Alejandro.  The couple have five grown up children who live independently.

This hard-working woman's business selling soda and beer is one of the busiest in the town of San Francisco.  Her great charisma and the kindness with which she serves her customers have made her business the most popular among her neighbors who don't hesitate to make their purchases in her store since they know that it is a business that is at its customers' disposal.

What Violeta most likes about her work is chatting to her customers about their problems and giving them advice.  She has been in this business for two years and she considers that the most difficult part of her work is putting up with the odd drunk who tries to go too far with their purchases.  However, she always puts them in their place.  She often has to serve non-stop if she  doesn't want her sales to drop.  In the future, she hopes that her business will grow and become the most popular in her town.

This is Violeta's second loan with MFP.  She knows that if she makes her repayments on time she will be able to access another loan more easily and without causing problems for her community bank.  Violeta will use the 2,000 Peruvian soles she has requested to buy candy and some small counters for her business.  In this way, she hopes that her business will continue to grow,

loans.use: To buy candy and some counters for her business

loans.name: Betty Alexandra

texts.es:
Betty de 32 años, tiene un negocio de venta de mariscos en un puesto de la calle principal de las orquídeas. Vive con su esposo y dos hijos. 

Con esfuerzo y dedicación ha hecho que el negocio de mariscos vuelva a tener ingresos ya que uno de sus amigos fue el primer dueño pero como le dio una mala administración no tuvo suficientes ingresos y quebró. Desde ese tiempo ella tiene el negocio y le ha ido muy bien con las ventas de pescado de todo tipo.  

Tiene variedad en el pescado por eso quiere seguir trabajando en este ambiente ya que ha tenido ingresos para mantener a su familia pero para mejorar su estilo de vida quiere el préstamo para mejorar su casa comprando con el dinero cemento, bloques arena. En el futuro quiere comprar una camioneta para mejorar las ventas de mariscos.
texts.en:
Betty is 32 years old.  She has a business selling seafood from a stall on the main road in Las Orquídeas.  She lives with her husband and two children.

Through hard work and commitment, Betty's seafood business is once again making a profit.  One of Betty's friends was the business' first owner.  However, as he ran it badly, he didn't make enough profit and he went bust.  Since that time, Betty has owned the business and it has done very well.  She sells all kinds of fish.

Betty offers a variety of fish and would like to continue working in this business since she makes enough profits to support her family.  However, in order to improve her lifestyle, she would like to take a loan to improve her home, using her money to buy cement, blocks and sand.  In the future, she would like to buy a truck to improve her seafood sales.

loans.use: To buy cement and blocks

loans.name: Freddy Valerio

texts.es:
Freddy tiene 42 años de edad, soltero y reside junto a sus padres y su hijo en   uno de los caseríos que conforman el distrito de Tambogrande, una zona agrícola que pertenece a la región Piura y que se encuentra situada a más de tres horas y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Se dedica a trabajar en actividades agrícolas: por un lado cuanta con ganado ovino y aves de corral, las cuales cría en diversos corrales situados cerca a su domicilio. El usualmente comercializa sus animales a los negociantes de la zona.  Los ingresos que percibe de estas actividades los utiliza para ayudar a su familia a salir adelante.

Freddy desea comprar alimento balanceado para engordar a los animales y comerciarlos posteriormente.  De modo que pueda percibir mayores ingresos y pueda seguir ayudando a su familia. Para lograr su objetivo ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Freddy is 42 years old, single, and lives with his parents and son in a neighborhood in the district of Tambogrande, an agricultural zone that belongs to the Piura region and is located more than three and a half hours from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of the Lambayeque region.

He works in agriculture with sheep and birds that he raises in different pens near his home. He normally sells his animals to the business people of his area. He uses the earnings from this work to help his family and to get ahead.

Freddy wishes to buy feed for fattening his animals that will later be sold. In this way he can earn more money and keep helping his family. To accomplish his goal he believed it would help to ask Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1,000 nuevos soles.

loans.use: To buy food for livestock

loans.name: Yessica

texts.es: Yessica, de 33 años, convive con su pareja María (34), tienen dos pequeños  hijos,  juntos habitan  una casa alquilada  ubicada en el distrito de Quimbiri.Ella es  una mujer muy alegre, carismática y empeñosa en sus labores desde que obtuvo la mayoría de edad se desempeño en diversos trabajos, acumulando sus ahorros decidió instalar una bodega, pues era  el negocio que siempre anhelo tener. En la actualidad  ofrece variedad de víveres al gusto del cliente, y su negocio esta situado en el distrito de Quimbiri donde y ya esta trabajando  10 años, esta muy satisfecha pues cuenta con el apoyo de su pareja. La venta de víveres le proporciona buenas ganancias por que gracias a ello pudo comprar un lote de terreno para poder brindar una mejor estadía a su familia. Entre sus  planes a futuro están el de  comprar un motocarro  y así cooperar con la ayuda de la carga  a sus buenos consumidores.Este es su octavo préstamo de Yessica con MFP, siente que el dinero del crédito le ayudara mucho en el progreso de su trabajo. En su banco comunal es  una socia muy querida y colaborada.Con los mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprara más víveres para surtir mejor  su tienda y así abastecerse de productos, de esta manera espera continuar adelante.
texts.en: Yessica is 33 years old and lives with her partner, María, who is 34.  They have two young children and live in a rented house in the district of Quimbiri.  She is a very happy, charismatic, and hard-working woman and has been working in different jobs her whole adult life.  With her savings, she decided to open a grocery store, as it was the sort of business she always desired to have.  She currently offers a variety of grocery items to satisfy her customers.  Her business is in the district of Quimbiri and she has been working there for 10 years.  She is very happy there and can depend upon her partner's support.  Selling groceries has provided a good income and, thanks to this, she was able to buy a plot of land to help her family.  Her future plans include buying a car to be able to deliver to her good customers.  This is Yessica's eighth loan with MFP and she feels that the loan money will greatly help her business to grow.  In her bank she is a very well-liked woman who works well with others.  She will use the 1,000 nuevos soles to buy more groceries to better stock her store and to carry more products.  In this way, she hopes to continue to move forward.

loans.use: To buy more groceries for her business

loans.name: Jose Alexander

texts.es:
José es cliente de 19 años de edad que reside junto a sus padres en uno de los caseríos que conforman el distrito agrícola de Tambogrande, perteneciente a la región Piura y se encuentra situada a 4 horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Se dedica a la crianza de ovinos, los cuales alimenta por un periodo de tiempo para comercializarlos posteriormente con los pobladores de su zona.  A la fecha y por el buen trato que da, tiene muchos clientes fidelizados que lo estiman y apoyan.  Adicionalmente trabaja en un hotel como jardinero.  Con los ingresos que percibe apoya la economía de su familia.

José desea adquirir alimento para engordar a su ganado y posterior mente comercializarlos. Con ello logrará percibir mayores ingresos por sus ventas, para lograr su objetivo ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Jose is 19 years old and lives with his parents in one of the homes that make up the agricultural district of Tambogrande which belongs to the Piura region and is located four hours from the city of Chiclayo, capital of the Lambayeque region. 

He raises sheep which he feeds for a period of time so that he can later sell them to the residents of his area. To date, and because of the good deals that he gives, he has a lot of loyal clients who consider and support him. He also works at a hotel as a gardener. He supports his family with the income that he receives. 

Jose wants to buy feed to fatten his livestock so that he can later sell it. This will allow him to make more profit from his sales. To meet his goal, he has requested a loan from field partner Edpyme Alternative in the amount of 1000 nuevos soles (PEN).

loans.use: Purchase feed to fatten livestock to later sell it.

loans.name: Roly

texts.es: Roly, de 21 años, es un joven muy jovial aunque todavía no cuenta con su propia casa, pero se esmera por sobresalir para salir adelante.El factor más relevante es “la creatividad y la persistencia continua” manifiesta, a pesar de su corta edad quiere lograr sus metas por si solo y aposto por la agricultura. Gracias al pequeño lote que sus padres le ofrecieron puede sembrar con tranquilidad sus sembríos de coca, café y cacao para poder sostenerse y solventarse sus gastos personales sin necesidad de la ayuda de sus padres. Viene trabajando cuatro años; y  sus cultivos  son muy fructíferos, lo único dificultoso es que no se abastece por si solo en sus cosechas y es indispensable el apoyo de jornaleros. Su planta más favorita es la hoja de coca ya que recibe buenas ganancias; aunque tiene momentos dificultosos por la invasión de las plagas ya que no puede combatirlas y le generan perdidas de granos. Con los ahorros obtenidos de cada año ampliara su lote de terreno con la finalidad de sembrar más productos y así mejorar sus ingresos económicos.Este es su primer crédito con MFP, por el cual se compromete a cumplir su cronograma de pagos, además agradece a su banco comunal por la confianza depositada.Tiene planeado invertir el dinero solicitado en la  compra de insumos y abono, con la finalidad de dar un buen mantenimiento a sus plantas, de esta manera espera continuar progresando.
texts.en: Roly is 21 years old. He is a very jovial young man even though he does not yet have his own home but he strives to excel to succeed. He believes that the most important factors are "continuous creativity and persistence". Despite his young age, he wants to achieve his goals on his own and has placed his bet on farming. Thanks to the small lot that his parents offered him he can peacefully grow his coca, coffee and cacao crops so that he can support himself and cover his personal expenses without help from his parents. He has been working for four years and his crops are very successful. The only difficult thing is that he cannot do everything himself during the harvest and the support of day laborers is essential. His favorite plant is the coca leaf since he can make a good profit. He has some difficult moments because of pest invasions since he cannot fight them and they result in losses of seeds. With his savings from each year he will expand his plot in order to plant more products and improve his income. This is his first loan with field partner MFP which he is committed to pay on time. He also thanks his community bank for their trust. He plans on investing the loan he is requesting on purchasing supplies and fertilizer in order to properly maintain his plants so that he can continue to progress.

loans.use: Purchase fertilizer to improve his crops.

loans.name: Sergio

texts.es: Sergio, de 38 años, es un hombre muy trabajador que esta casado con Maximiliana (38)  y sus tres pequeños hijos.Los largos días de trabajo que tiene en sus tierras, han hecho que se vuelva una gran conocedor de la agricultura, sus cultivos de coca, café y plátano están bien cuidados y siempre consigue un buen precio por la venta de sus productos en la ciudad de San Francisco, ya que es en este lugar donde tiene más compradores. Viene trabajando 20 años en este rubro  y cuenta con el apoyo de toda su familia; lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cultivar el plátano, ya que es el fruto que le genera  mas ingresos y la cosecha es mensualmente, además considera que lo más dificultoso es no poder transportar sus productos, ya que las cargas son muy pesadas. Con el tiempo, espera comprar su propia moto carguera para que le facilite el transporte de sus productos.Este es el sexto préstamo de Sergio con MFP, por lo cual se compromete a seguir cumpliendo con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales, ya que no quiere causarle problemas a su banco comunal, donde se siente muy contento.Tiene planeado invertir  los dos mil nuevos soles solicitados en la compra de varias plantas de plátano, de esta manera espera continuar progresando.
texts.en: Sergio, a hard-working man, is 38,  married to Maximiliana (38) and they have three young children.  The long working days in the fields have made him knowledgeable about his crops of coca, café and plantains.  The crops are well taken care of and always receive good prices in the city of San Francisco, where he has more buyers.  He has been working for 20 years in farming and he has his family’s help. What he likes most about his work is growing plantains since this is a fruit that generates higher profits and the crop is monthly.  What he finds the most difficult is not being able to transport his products since they are very heavy.  With time he hopes to buy his own truck to help with the transporting.  This is Sergio’s sixth loan with MFP, and he promises to make his monthly payments on time so that there won’t be any problem with the communal bank.  He is very satisfied with the bank and he plans to use the two thousand new sols to buy assorted plantain plants and in this way his business will continue growing.

loans.use: To buy plantain plants to expand his crops

loans.name: Silbera

texts.es: Silbera, de 42 años, es una mujer muy forjadora y convive con Juan (43)  y sus cuatro  hijos que viven en su casa propia en la comunidad de Palmapampa; juntos se esfuerzan cada día para salir adelante.Los arduos trabajos que realiza Silbera  en su parcela, han hecho que sus cultivos estén muy bien cuidados y que los días de venta en la ciudad de San Francisco, sus productos sean rápidamente comprados en los centros de acopio. Sus principales fuentes de ingresos, son la venta de cacao, café y coca, ya que son de muy buena calidad. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cosechar sus productos, ya que esta obteniendo ganancias después del arduo trabajo que le costo sembrarlos, ya  lleva 10 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es cuidar sus cultivos de las plagas que pueden afectarlas. Con el tiempo, desea comprar su máquina fumigadora para combatir la plaga y obtener buenos frutos.Este es el decimo préstamo de Silbera  con MFP, y promete ser  muy puntual en su cronograma de pagos; en su banco comunal es una socia muy querida por el carisma que siempre le caracteriza.Con los mil quinientos nuevos soles solicitados, comprará semillas, abono y fertilizantes, para mejorar sus cultivos, de esta manera espera mejorar sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Silbera is 42 years old.  She is a hard-working woman who lives with her partner Juan (43) and her four children in her own home in the community of Palmapampa.  Together they work hard every day to get ahead in life.

Silbera's hard work on her plot of land has meant that her crops are very well cared for and, when she comes to sell them in the city of San Francisco, they sell quickly in the warehouse centers.  Silbera's main sources of income are her cacao, coffee and coca sales since she grows very good quality products.

What Silbera most likes about her work is harvesting her products since she is making profits after the hard work that she put into growing them.  She has been in this business for 10 years and she considers the most difficult part of her work to be protecting her crops from the pests that can affect them.  Over time, she would like to buy a dusting machine to combat these pests and obtain good products.

This is Silbera's tenth loan from MFP.  She pledges to be very punctual in making her loan repayments.  She is a very well-liked member of her community bank because of her charisma.  She will use the 1,500 Peruvian soles she has requested to buy seeds, manure and fertilizers to improve her crops.  In this way, she hopes to improve her profits.

loans.use: To buy seeds, manure and fertilizer to improve her crops

loans.name: Alexandra Teresa

texts.es:
Alexandra de 24 años, siempre le ha gustado el comercio y empezó a trabajar desde muy temprana edad ya que es madre soltera para poder financiar sus gastos y el de sus hijos. 

Ella vende joyería y bisutería a diferentes personas conocidos y amigos del sector donde vive. Vende pulseras, anillos, cadenas etc. No tiene horario fijo para sus ventas ya que es comerciante informal. Tiene muchas aspiraciones en su negocio por eso quiere continuar para darle una buena vida a su hijo. 

Quiere tener en un futuro un negocio establecido con venta de joyería pero por ahora para llegar a ese objetivo quiere comprar con el préstamo joyas, zapatos y ropa para tener un ingreso adicional y así darle una buena vida a su hijo.
texts.en:
Alexandra is 24 years old.  She has always liked selling and she started working at a very early age since she is a single mother and she had to cover her own expenses and those of her child.

Alexandra sells jewelry and costume jewelry to acquaintances and friends in her area.  She sells bracelets, rings, chains, etc.  She doesn't work regular hours since she is an informal saleswoman.  She has many aspirations for her business and would like to continue in her business so that she can provide her child with a good life.

In the future, Alexandra would like to have an established jewelry business but, for now, in order to achieve this goal, she would like to use her loan to buy jewelry, shoes and clothes so that she can make additional income and provide a good life for her child.

loans.use: Jewelry and costume jewelry

loans.name: Luzmila

texts.es: Luzmila, de 39 años, vive con sus tres  hijos en su casa propia.Desde hace seis  años, se dedica a la venta de abarrotes en su tienda que esta instalada en su vivienda, además comercializa  animales luego de hacerlos engordar por 3 meses, de esta manera abastece a sus vecinos con productos de primera necesidad. Los días sábados sale a vender sus productos en la feria comercial de su localidad y  sus hijos la ayudan en el comercio que realiza ya que ella tiene que transportar  su mercancía que tiene un peso considerable y ubicar su puesto de ventas ya que en ese día su venta es de manera  ambulante, pero las ganancias son considerables.  Este negocio le ha resultado pues esta saliendo adelante a paso seguro.Es su décimo crédito que tiene con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas que conoce, responsables y muy solidarias, agradece  a aquellas personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita y le será  muy útil en el progreso de su actividad económica.El préstamo le servirá para comprar mayor cantidad de  mercadería en productos enlatados, también  arroz y azúcar en sacos, pues desea ofrecer lo mejor a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Luzmila is 39 years old.  She lives with her three children in her own home.

For six years, Luzmila has been selling groceries from her store which is located in her home.  She also sells animals after having fattened them for 3 months.  In this way, she supplies her neighbors with essential food products.  On Saturdays, she goes out to sell her products in her local market.  Her children help her with her sales since she has to transport her merchandise, which weighs quite a lot, and also set up her sales stall since on Saturdays she doesn't make her sales from a fixed location.  However, her profits are considerable.

This business has done very well for Luzmila since she is steadily getting ahead in life.  This is her tenth loan with MFP.  She is happy to know that she has financial support and likes being a member of her community bank because all the members are people that she knows.  They are all responsible and very supportive of each other.  Luzmila is grateful to the people who will fund her loan and it will be very useful for her in making progress in her business.  She will use the loan to buy a larger quantity of merchandise: canned goods and sacks of rice and sugar, as she would like to offer her customers the best she can.

loans.use: To buy merchandise (food products) to stock her store

loans.name: Darwin Gabriel

texts.es:
Darwing de 32 años, estuvo trabajando y aprendiendo en una cerrajería para practicar esta actividad como un ingreso fijo ya que le gusta mucho trabajar en esta actividad de servicio. 

Poco a poco con esfuerzo y dedicación ha podido tener clientela en un pequeño puesto que tiene donde trabaja desde las 08h30 hasta las 18h00pm arreglando y reparando planchas de fierro, tubos etc. El hace puertas, ventanas de todo tipo con metales que el comprar para elaborarlas y hacerlas en un tiempo determinado. 

Tiene muchas aspiración con su negocio porque es quien le ha ayudado a mantener a sus dos hijas por eso quiere continuar con su negocio comprando con el préstamo tubos, metal, planchas.
texts.en:
Darwin is 32 years old.  He worked and trained in a locksmith's shop so that he could carry out this business as a regular job since he very much likes doing this work.

Gradually, through hard work and commitment, he has been able to attract customers to a small stall where he works from 8.30am to 6.00pm, fixing and repairing irons, exhaust pipes, etc.  He makes all kinds of doors and windows with metals that he buys to make his products within a certain period of time.

Darwin has a lot of aspirations for his business because it has helped him to support his two daughters.  For this reason, he would like to continue in his business, using his loan to buy exhaust pipes, metal and irons.

loans.use: To buy exhaust pipes, irons and metal

loans.name: Arista

texts.es: Arista, D. 66 años, vive con su esposo en su casa propia.DesD. su niñez se ha dedicado a la agricultura y la ganadería y  durante más D. 20 años esto le ha servido para  asegurar la alimentación D. su familia. En la actualidad tiene vacas, toros, burros y caballos a los que  cuida diariamente brindándoles alimentación y un ambiente D. descanso que es su propio establo. D. vez en cuando comercializa  sus animales y después adquiere otras D. mejor calidad, siembra paralelamente maíz y papa D. las cuales después D. varios meses pueD. ver sus ganancias por lo que desea incrementar más la cantidad D. animales D. su establo.Es su primer crédito que tiene con MFP, esta muy contenta D.  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero y agradece  a aquellas personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita y le será  muy útil en el progreso D. su actividad económica.Arista tiene planeado invertir el dinero del crédito  en la compra D. varios sacos D. abono ya que sembrara alfalfa y pastos para  el alimento D. su ganado, D. esta manera espera continuar progresando.
texts.en: 66 year old Arista lives with her husband in their own home. She has been working in agriculture and livestock raising since she was a child, and for more than 20 years this occupation enabled her to feed her family. She currently has cows, bulls, donkeys, and horses, which she cares for daily, giving them food and a relaxing environment in her stable. Every now and then she sells her animals and then buys others of greater quality. At the same time, she grows corn and potatoes, and after several months she sees the profits and so she wants to increase the number of animals in her stable. This is her first loan from MFP and she is very happy to know that she has financial support and she is grateful to the people who will fulfill the loan that she is requesting, which will be very useful in developing her economic activities. Arista plans to use the money to buy sacks of fertilizer for her crops of alfalfa and fodder to feed her livestock, and in this way she hopes to continue progressing.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer for her alfalfa crop

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase of chickens.

loans.name: Esther Maria

texts.es:
Esther es una joven emprendedora que desde muy joven la mama le enseño administrar el negocio de la papelería. Viviendo en una zona periurbana ha trabajado en conjunto con su mama para poder generar ingresos para el hogar. 

Tiene muchas aspiraciones para el futuro por eso quiere continuar con el negocio ya que se levanta desde muy temprano para atenderlo. Su abuela en ocasiones también le ayuda en la atención vende papelería de todo tipo y algunas prendas de vestir. 

En el futuro quiere continuar apoyando a su familia con el negocio por eso quiere ahora comprar con el préstamo ropa para tener mas variedad para los clientes.
texts.en:
Esther is an entrepreneurial young woman whose mother taught her when she was very young to run their stationary store. She lives outside the city and works together with her mother to generate income for their family.

She has many hopes for the future. This is why she wants to keep working at the store and why she gets up early in the morning to go work there. Her grandmother also helps her out from time to time selling a wide variety of stationary and a few items of clothing.

In the future, she would like to continue supporting her family by working at the store. This is why she wants to use the loan to purchase more clothing in order to offer their customers a greater variety.

loans.use: Clothing

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy animals and medicines for bone pain

loans.name: Marilin

texts.es:
Marilin es una cliente de 24 años, conviviente, que reside con su pareja y su hija en el distrito de Tambogrande, una zona agrícola que pertenece a la región Piura y que se encuentra situada a más de tres horas y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Se dedica a preparar y vender salchipollos (plato consistente en una fritura de pollo, mezclado con papas fritas, hot dog y ensalada de verduras).  El ofrece este producto en su casa, los días sábado y domingo y debido a la buena sazón con la que prepara sus platos, actualmente goza de una clientela estable y fiel que siempre recurre a su negocio para solicitar los alimentos que ofrece.

Marilin necesita adquirir insumos para ampliar su producción y responder a la demanda con la que actualmente cuenta.  Por ello ha creído conveniente comprar diversos artículos como aceite, verduras y hot dog.  Para lograr su objetivo ha creído conveniente pedir un préstamo de 500 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa.
texts.en:
Marilin is a 24 year old client.  She is in a common-law marriage.  She lives with her life partner and their daughter in the Tambogrande district.  It is an agricultural district in the Piura region.  It is over three and a half hours from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of the Lambayeque region.

She prepares and sells “salchipollos” (a dish which consists of fried chicken mixed with fried potatoes, hot dog, and a medley of vegetables).  She sells this product at her house on Saturdays and Sundays.  Due to the good seasoning that she uses to prepare her dishes, she now has stable and loyal customers.  They always go to her business to request the foods that she makes.

Marilin needs to get supplies to increase her production to respond to the demand she now has.  That is why she believes it is advisable to buy various things like oil, vegetables, and hot dogs.  In order to achieve her objective she believes it is wise to request a loan of 500 soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: To get supplies to increase her production

loans.name: Octavio Reinaldo

texts.en:
Octavio lives in the peri-urban area of Paraiso in Guayaquil. He is 32 years old and married. He and his wife have three children — a seven-year-old, a six-year-old, and a three-year-old. His two oldest children study in public schools.

When Octavio was 18 years old, he started working for a bakery. Three years ago he started his own bakery. He and his wife start work at 5:30am. They sell bread and sweets. With his loan, Octavio would like to buy a mixer for his bakery. 

The main problem Octavio deals with is the heavy rain in the winter; this makes it more difficult to transport the ingredients from the store to his bakery. In the future he would like to move his bakery to a bigger street where more people pass, so he can serve more customers.

loans.use: To buy a mixer for his bakery

loans.name: Hilda

texts.es: Hilda, de 48 años, vive con su esposo y sus tres  hijos en su casa propia.Toda su vida ha estado ligada  a las actividades agrícolas, es así que cada día esta dedicada al cultivo de la papa y el maíz que con mucha dedicación observa los terrenos de cultivo y verifica  la aparición de posibles plagas que pueden afectar seriamente sus cosechas. Las ganancias obtenidas  le permiten  tomar acciones concretas que la ayudaran  tener una buena producción y recuperación de la inversión que realizo en la época de siembra, para ahorrar en su inversión cuenta con sus equipos y herramientas como su tractor que le facilitan la labor. Para mas adelante desea aumentar su producción.Es su quinto crédito que tiene con MFP, esta muy contento de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal, porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias, agradece  a aquellas personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita pues le será  muy útil en el progreso de su actividad económica.Hilda tiene planeado invertir el dinero solicitado  en la compra de varios sacos de abono y fertilizantes que necesita para su campaña de siembra, de esta manera espera seguir adelante.
texts.en:
Hilda, age 48, lives with her husband and their three daughters in their own house.  She has been tied to farm work her whole life.  Every day she devotes herself to growing potatoes and corn.  With great dedication she watches over her fields and checks for the appearance of possible pest infestations that could seriously affect her crops.

Her earnings allow her to take concrete actions, which will allow her to have a good production and recuperate the investment she made during planting season.  In order to save on her investment she has equipment and tools like her tractor, which facilitate the work.  Later on she wishes to increase her production.

This is her fifth loan with MFP.  She is very happy to know that she has financial support.  Also, she is grateful to be part of her communal bank because all of the members are responsible and very supportive people.

She is grateful to the people who will be the lenders of the loan she is requesting.  The loan will be very useful to her in the progress of her financial activity.  She plans to use the requested money to buy various sacks of natural and chemical fertilizers that she needs for the planting season.  This is the way she plans to get ahead.

loans.use: To buy natural and chemical fertilizers to improve her crops

loans.name: Flor Maria

texts.en: Flor Maria C. R. is 37 years old, separated, and has two children, both of whom attend school.  She lives in the peri-urban area of Paraiso in Guayaquil. She used to sell clothing, but she always wanted to have a restaurant so she started selling lunches at her house. Flor works from Monday through Sunday. She sells “encebollado” (a typical Ecuadorian dish made of tuna, cassava, tomatoes, and onions). This is her first loan through D-MIRO and she plans to use the $1,000 loan to buy tables, chairs, and a fridge.

loans.use: To purchase chairs, tables, and a fridge for restaurant

loans.name: Mariana Del Rocio

texts.es:
La Señora. Mariana C. es socia del banco comunal Divino niño Jesús, vive por el sector de Miraflores en la ciudad de Cuenca que es considerada como la tercera ciudad  más importante del País, es de clima frió, su gastronomía es muy variada y cautiva a propios y extraños, su gente es amable y calida.

La Señora. Mariana tiene 40 años de edad, es casada y  tiene 3 hijos de 22, 18 y 7 años de edad, sus dos primeros hijos son casados y viven independientes, su último hijo estudia en una escuela de la ciudad. Su esposo tiene un taller propio en donde trabaja en la rama de la carpintería, no tienen casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.

Doña Mariana se dedica a la venta de ropa, actividad que la realiza en sus tiempos libres hace 2 años, vende sus productos a sus amigas y conocidas, también vende  imágenes de cristos que realiza su esposo actividad que la realiza hace 5 años.
 
Es socia del banco comunal hace un año y medio y  su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de más ropa para surtir su mercadería. Su sueño es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Mariana C. is a member of the Divino Niño Jesús Communal Bank.  She lives in the Miraflores sector of the city of Cuenca.  It is considered to be the third most important city of the country.  The climate is cool, the cuisine is quite varied, and it enchants both locals and foreigners. The people are friendly and welcoming.

Mariana is 40 years old and married.  She has three children, ages 22, 18, and 7.  Her first two children are married and live independently.  Her last child goes to a school in the city.  Her husband has his own shop where he works in the carpentry trade.  They do not have their own house; they rent where they live.

Mariana sells clothes.  She has been doing this in her free time for two years.  She sells her products to her friends and acquaintances.  For five years she has also been selling replicas of Christ that her husband makes.

She has been a member of the communal bank for one and a half years.  She will use her new loan to buy more clothes to stock her merchandise.

Her dream is to have her own house.

loans.use: To buy clothes

loans.name: Homero

texts.en:
Homero G. is a business coach for entrepreneurs. He began "G. NT, Inc." because he saw that people within the small business community needed assistance bringing companies to scale. He has always been interested in the difficulties that businesses face, so when he learned about coaching, he knew this was the perfect job for him. Homero says his competencies are in understanding growth and in teaching, which makes him a successful coach. He helps entrepreneurs build infrastructure in their businesses and teaches them about leadership and communication. He works individually with entrepreneurs to develop a program that is based on their specific goals and needs. Homero likes to work with a business for about a year in order to identify problems, talk through the issues, and implement solutions with the entrepreneur. He works with established businesses as well as emerging ones.  

Homero says that the success and growth of the businesses he works with has to do with the commitment of the entrepreneur. As for his business, he is in the process of writing a growth plan. At the moment he is the only coach at the firm, but he is developing a framework to teach others how to coach. Homero wanted a loan from ACCION Texas-Louisiana in order to help expand his presence on the web, which is another important way to grow the company.  

He describes his coaching as “not so much listening, but having the hunger to hear what people say in their own contexts.” He was trained as a social scientist, so he has a strong theoretical background in organizational behavior that helps him succeed at his job. Homero deeply believes in what he does because he knows how important these businesses are to the entrepreneurs who run them. Small business owners invest their whole lives into building their businesses, which is why growth is so important for them.

loans.use: To expand his website

loans.name: Andrea Cristina

texts.es:
La Señora Andrea T. es socia del banco comunal Divino niño Jesús, vive por la comunidad de Paccha, esta comunidad se caracteriza por su gente que es muy trabajadora, la mayor parte se dedica a la cría de animales, mucha de su gente laboran en la ciudad realizando diferentes actividades.

Doña Andrea tiene 20 años y vive en unión libre, tiene una hija de 7 meses de edad. Su esposo labora en la colocación de estucos y pintor de casas, no tienen casa propia por lo que vive en un cuarto pequeño que su suegra les ha prestado.

La Señora. Andrea se dedica por el momento al cuidado de su hija y ayuda a su mamá al cuidado de los animales que también son de su propiedad.

Se encuentra en su segundo crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y fue invitada por su mamá, su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos y también para apoyarle a su esposo a que se ponga un taller de colocación de cielos rasos. Su meta es  superarse junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Andrea T. is a member of the Divino Niño Jesús Communal Bank.  She lives in the Paccha community.  This community is characterized by its very hard-working people.  Most of them raise animals, and some of them work at different business activities in the city .

Andrea is 20 years old, and she is in a common-law marriage.  She has a seven month old daughter.  Her husband works installing stucco and painting houses.  She does not have her own house, so she lives in a small room that her mother-in-law has lent them.

Andrea currently takes care of her daughter, and she helps her mother take care of the animals that they own.

This is her second loan with the communal bank.  Her mother invited her.  She will use the new loan to buy chickens.  She will also use it to help her husband set up a workshop for putting up stucco ceilings.

Her goal is to excel together with her family.

loans.use: To buy chickens and to set up a shop for stucco ceilings

loans.name: Ronald

texts.es: Ronald, de  32 años, vive con sus padres en la casa de unos familiares; pero juntos luchan por salir adelante en busca del progreso.Desde hace 9 años,  se dedica a la venta de abarrotes, para lograrlo se asocio con uno de sus familiares y tiene la mitad del capital que han invertido. En sociedad arrendaron un local comercial en una calle muy céntrica de su ciudad para vender, al por mayor y menor, y también ofrecen gran variedad de productos de primera necesidad, el turno de la atención lo distribuye con su socio. Ronald se dedica durante los fines de semana a la  venta de  animales y también para  su consumo propio. El  negocio de venta de abarrotes le ha salido rentable por lo que desea en el  futuro  ampliar su negocio y tener uno propio.Es su octavo crédito que tiene con MFP, esta muy contento de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas que conoce, responsables y muy solidarias, además agradece  a aquellas personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita y le será  muy útil en el progreso de su actividad económica.Ronald tiene planeado invertir el dinero solicitado  en la compra de mas abarrotes al por mayor, de esta manera espera continuar progresando.
texts.en:
Ronald, 32, lives with his parents in the home of some relatives.  Together they work to get ahead for a better life.  For the past 9 years he has sold groceries with one of his relatives, and he has put half of the money into the business.  They have rented a commercial location on a very central street of the city to sell, both wholesale and retail, and they also offer a big variety of staple goods.  He and his partner alternate working there.
Ronald works on the weekends selling animals and also buys for his own consumption.  The grocery store has turned out to be profitable and he would like to expand it in the future and have his own business.  This is the eighth loan that he has had with MFP.  He is very satisfied to know that he has financial support, and he also likes being part of a communal bank because he knows all the people, and they are responsible and very helpful.  He  would like to thank those who have offered the loan that he is requesting. It will be very useful for his financial future.  Ronald plans to use the money to buy more merchandise wholesale and in this way continue growing.

loans.use: To buy merchandise to stock his store

loans.name: Erasmo

texts.es:
