Erasmo, es un cliente de 26 años, conviviente quien reside en uno de los caseríos que conforman el distrito de Tambogrande, una zona agrícola que pertenece a la región Piura y que se encuentra situada a más de tres horas y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.


Se dedica a trabajar en actividades relacionadas con la crianza y venta de animales. El cría ganado ovino y vacuno en algunos corrales situados cerca a su domicilio, los engorda alimentándoles de pastos naturales y cuando estos ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta al público en general  y a los negociantes que suelen visitar la zona en donde reside. Adicionalmente comercializa leche a la Municipalidad Distrital de Tambogrande. Esta actividad le permite ayudar a su familia con el sostenimiento de la economía.


Erasmo desea adquirir alimento balanceado para mejorar la crianza de sus animales y lograr que se desarrollen de mejor modo. Con ello logrará percibir mayores ingresos por sus ventas, para lograr su objetivo ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Erasmo is a client who is 26 years old. He lives with his partner in one of the small towns in the district of Tambogrande, an agricultural area in Piura, which is located more than 3.5 hours from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of the region of Lambayeque. 

He has a business related to raising and selling livestock. He raises sheep and cattle in some corrals that are located near his home. He fattens them by feeding them natural grasses and when they have reached a good weight he offers them for sale to the general public, and also to businesspeople who visit the area where he lives. He also sells milk in the Municipal District of Tambogrande. This business allows him to help his family with expenses.

Erasmo would like to buy balanced feed to improve the growth of his animals so they can achieve better development. This will help him to improve the income from his sales. In order to achieve his goal, he has requested a loan of PEN 1,000.00 from Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: To buy balanced feed to improve the growth of his livestock.

loans.name: Rita Isabel

texts.es:
La Señora. Rita V. es socia del banco comunal Divino niño Jesús, vive por la ciudadela Simón Bolívar  en la ciudad de Cuenca que es la tercera ciudad más importante del País, es de clima frió, su gastronomía es muy variada y cautiva a propios y extraños, su gente es amable y calida.

La Señora. Rita tiene 38 años, es divorciada y tiene 2 hijos de 16 y 5 años de edad, su primer hijo estudia en un colegio de la ciudad, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.
 
Doña Rita se dedica a la venta de comida rápida, esta actividad la realiza hace 3 años, vende solo los fines de semana desde las 3 de la tarde hasta las 7 de la noche.

Se encuentra en su cuarto crédito que realiza en el banco comunal, el dinero de su crédito lo va a utilizar para el incremento de su negocio, comprando productos que le hacen falta. Su sueño es tener casa propia.
texts.en:
Rita V. is a member of the “Divino Niño Jesús” communal bank. She lives near the Simón Bolívar neighborhood in the city of Cuenca, which is the third most important city in the country. The climate is cool, the cuisine is quite varied, and it enchants both locals and foreigners. The people are friendly and welcoming. 

Rita is 38 years old. She is divorced and has 2 children who are 16 and 5 years old. Her first son studies in a high school in the city. She does not have her own house and lives in a rented house.

Rita sells fast food. She has been in this business for 3 years. She sells only on the weekends, from 3:00 in the afternoon until 7:00 at night. 

She is in her fourth loan with the communal bank. She will use the loan to grow her business by buying products that she needs. Her dream is to have her own house.

loans.use: To buy products for her business

loans.name: Juntas Progresaremos Group

texts.es:
JUNTAS PROGRESAREMOS

Guísela es presidenta del grupo de Alcancía Comunal “JUNTAS PROGRESAREMOS”
Este grupo esta conformado por 9 personas las cuales se conocieron por medio de ser vecinos y así juntaron un grupo de 9 personas responsables y así juntaron y conformaron la Alcancía comunal.
Guísela es madre soltera de 1 niña que tiene 2 años de edad Guísela tiene ya 4 años trabajando vendiendo productos de belleza antes de trabajar vendiendo los productos comenzó vendiendo solo el catalogo de los productos de belleza si Guísela tuviera un capital de trabajo lo invertiría en comprarse un auto para poder trabajarlo y con la ayuda de Edaprospo-Prosperidad esperemos que lo logre
texts.en:
JUNTAS PROGRESAREMOS 

Guísela is the president of the “Juntas Progresaremos” communal bank. This group is made up of 9 people who knew each other because they were neighbors. So, they got together the group of 9 responsible people and formed the communal bank. 

Guísela is a single mother with a girl who is 2 years old. Guísela has been working for 4 years selling beauty products. BefO. selling these products she started by just selling from the catalogs of beauty products. If Guísela had the capital, she would use it to invest in a car so that she could rent it out, and with the help of Edaprospo-Prosperidad, we hope she will achieve that goal.

loans.use: To buy beauty products

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
Julia,  es una cliente de 40 años, conviviente quien reside con su pareja y sus 3 hijos en uno de los caseríos que conforman el distrito de Tambogrande, una zona agrícola que pertenece a la región Piura y que se encuentra situada a más de tres horas y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.


Se dedica a la comercialización de pescado fresco, el cual ofrece todos los días en una pequeña tienda instalada en su domicilio.  Asimismo sale a recorrer junto a su esposo los diversos caseríos cercanos para ofrecer su mercadería.  Ella adquiere el pescado todos los días en el Terminal pesquero de su región.  El negocio es la única fuente de ingresos con la que cuenta su familia por lo que siempre trata de mantenerlo del mejor modo posible.


Ella desea adquirir más pescado para satisfacer la demanda con la que actualmente cuenta. Con ello logrará percibir mayores ingresos por sus ventas, para lograr su objetivo ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 500 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Julia is a client who is 40 years old. She lives with her partner and their 3 children in one of the small towns in the district of Tambogrande, an agricultural area in Piura, which is located more than 3.5 hours from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of the region of Lambayeque.

Her business is selling fresh fish, which she sells every day in a small store she has in her house. She also goes out with her husband to several nearby towns to sell her fish. She gets them everyday at the Fish Terminal for the area. This business is the only source of income for her family, which is why she always tries to keep it going as well as possible.

She would like to buy more fish so she can satisfy the existing demand. By doing this she will achieve a better income from her sales. In order to do this, she has requested a loan of PEN 500.00 from Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: To buy more fish

loans.name: Emmanuel 1, 2 & 3 Group

texts.en:
Guillermina is the coordinator of her group, Emmanuel 1, 2 & 3. Her story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican clients generally, many of whom recently emigrated to the Dominican Republic from Haiti. Guillermina's group is located in the rural communities surrounding El Seybo, a rural town where agriculture dominates the economy and where running water — none of which is potable — and electricity are unreliable. She makes her home here in a simple structure with her husband. They have raised four children together.

Guillermina is excited to be taking her sixth loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loans and grown her business considerably. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business by purchasing sugar, coconut, and milk to produce sweet, local candies. She will use the profits to reinvest in her business with the dream of one day owning her own candy shop from which to sell home-maD. candies and pastries. She thanks you all for your support.

loans.use: To buy sugar, milk, and coconut for candies

loans.name: Maria Eloisa

texts.es:
María tiene 60 años D. edad, es casada y resiD. con su esposo y sus 2 menores hijos en el distrito D. Chulucanas, que pertenece a la región Piura, a 4 horas D. la ciudad D. Chiclayo, capital del departamento D. Lambayeque. 

Se dedica a trabajar en actividades relacionadas con la crianza y venta D. animales. Ella cría ganado ovino y aves D. corral en algunos corrales situados cerca a su domicilio, teniendo a la fecha 15 pavos y 10 gallinas, los engorda alimentándoles D. pastos naturales y cuando estos ya han alcanzado un buen nivel D. desarrollo los ofrece en venta al público en general  y a los negociantes que suelen visitar la zona en donD. resiD.. Esta actividad le permite ayudar a su esposo con el sostenimiento D. la economía D. su familia.

María desea comprar alimento balanceado para engordar a sus animales, y una vez que estén desarrollados venderlos y así obtener mayores ganancias que le permitan seguir progresando y ayudando a su familia a salir adelante. Para lograr su objetivo ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito D. 1000 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
María is 60 years old, married and lives with her husband and her 2 youngest children in Chulucanas district, which is part of the Piura region, 4 hours from Chiclayo, the capital of the department of Lambayeque.

She works in activities related to raising and selling animals. She raises sheep and poultry in some pens near her home and right now has 15 turkeys and 10 chickens. She fattens them by feeding them natural grasses, and when they have reached a good level of development she sells them to the general public and to traders who visit the area where she lives. This activity allows her to help her husband with the family´s finances.

María would like to buy nutritious feed for fattening the animals, and once they are grown, sell them and in this way get higher profits. This will enable her to continue progressing and helping her family cope. To reach this objective she has decided to ask Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1000 new soles.

loans.use: Buy nutritious feed for her animals.

loans.name: Nueva Ilusión (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Nueva Ilusión esta formado por 9 mujeres con un gran carisma y alegría a pesar de sus dificultades en el día a día, laboran en diferentes actividades que les a permitido aportar a la economía de sus hogares. Todas viven por la parroquia de Cumbe encontrando en ella la paz y la tranquilidad de la naturaleza, su gente es muy calida a pesar del frió que hay en el sector, la mayor parte su población se dedica a la cría de animales y a la agricultura, muchos también laboran en la ciudad de Cuenca en diferentes actividades.

La Señorita Jessica B. es socia del banco comunal Nueva Ilusión, vive en la comunidad de Los Olivos en la parroquia de Cumbe, tiene 19 años de edad es soltera y vive en la casa de sus padres, su mamá se dedica a los quehaceres domésticos y su padre es maestro de la construcción ya que es albañil, sus padres tienen casa propia. 
La Señorita Jessica estudia en un colegio de la ciudad y cursa el último año de sus estudios.
Es su segundo crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y fue invitada por su mamá, su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos para iniciar con este negocio. Su meta es llegar a ser una buena profesional.

La Señora. Carmen M. es socia del banco comunal Nueva Ilusión, vive en la comunidad 3 de Noviembre en la parroquia de Cumbe, se encuentra en su segundo crédito y fue invitada por una amiga y vecina a formar parte del banco comunal.
Tiene 35 años, es casada y tiene 2 hijos de 13 y 11 años de edad, su primera hija estudia en el colegio y su segundo hijo en una escuela de la ciudad. Su esposo labora en la construcción ya que es maestro albañil, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven en casa de su mamá compartiendo los gastos.
Doña Carmen se dedica a la cría de animales como ganado, ovejas y pollos, animales que vende cuando tiene alguna necesidad, también los utiliza para el consumo de la casa.
El dinero de su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de abono y hierba para mejorar sus potreros. Su meta es  tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
The community bank "Nueva Ilusion" is made up of nine women with great charisma and joy despite their every day challenges. They work different jobs that have allowed them to contribute to the economy of their homes. They all live near the parish of Cumbre finding in it the peace and tranquility of nature. The people are very warm despite the cold weather in the area. Most of the population is engaged in animal husbandry and agriculture, many also work in the city of Cuenca in different activities.

Jessica B. is a member of the community bank Nueva Ilusion. She lives in the community of Los Olivos in the Cumbre parish. She is 19 years old, is single and lives with her parents. Her mother is a homemaker and her father is a master in construction since he is a construction worker. Her parents own their own home. 

Jessica is in school at a college in the city and she is in the last year of her studies. This is the second loan she has received from the community bank. She was invited to join by her mother. She will invest her loan in buying chickens so that she can start her business. Her goal is to become a good professional. 

Carmen M. is a member of the community bank Nueva Ilusion. She lives in the community of 3 de Noviembre in the Cumbre parish. This is her second loan and she was invited by a friend and neighbor to be part of the community bank. She is 35 years old, is married and has two children ages 13 and 11. Her first daughter is in school and her second son is at school in the city. Her husband works in construction since he is a master mason. They do not have their own home which is why they live in her mother's home and share the expenses. 

Carmen raises animals such as cattle, sheep and chickens. She sells these animals when she needs to and also uses them for consumption in her home. She will use the money from the loan in invest in the purchase of fertilizer and feed to improve her pastures. Her goal is to have her own home.

loans.use: Purchase chickens, fertilizer and feed.

loans.name: Jesus

texts.es:
El señor Jesús Verástegui tiene ya más de dos años dedicándose a la venta de ropa usada y juguetes. 
Al negocio le está haciendo falta más variedad de mercancía pero en este momento no cuenta con el dinero necesario para la inversión que su negocio necesita. 
Es por eso que está solicitando un préstamo y planea pagarlo con las ganancias que obtiene del negocio. 
Ya que los gastos familiares serán cubiertos con el ingreso que obtiene de su trabajo  en una maquiladora, como empleado de producción. 
La persona que aparece en la foto es la señora Diana Gabriela Zúñiga esposa del Sr. Verástegui, ella está a cargo del negocio y él ayuda los fines de semana. A don Jesús le fue imposible acudir a la cita pues su horario de trabajo se lo impidio.
texts.en:
Mr Jesus V. has already sold used clothing and toys for over two years. The business needs more variety in its merchandise, but at the moment he does not have the necessary money for the investment that his business needs. For this reason, he has requested a loan and plans to repay it with the earnings from his business. The household costs will be covered by the income that he obtains from his work at a factory as a production employee.

The person appearing in this photo is Mrs Diana Gabriela Zúñiga, who helps him in the business when he is working. She was the one who spoke to us.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise for the business

loans.name: Camilo Benigno

texts.es:
Camilo tiene 28 años de edad, es casado y reside con su esposo y sus 2 menores hijos en uno de los caseríos agrícolas , que pertenece a la región Piura, a 4 horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital del departamento de Lambayeque. 

Se dedica a trabajar en actividades relacionadas con la crianza y venta de animales. El cría ganado ovino y aves de corral en algunos corrales situados cerca a su domicilio, los engorda alimentándoles de pastos naturales y cuando estos ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta al público en general  y a los negociantes que suelen visitar la zona en donde reside. Esta actividad le permite ayudar al sostenimiento de la economía de su familia.

Camilo desea comprar alimento balanceado para engordar a sus animales, y una vez que estén desarrollados venderlos y así obtener mayores ganancias que le permitan seguir progresando y ayudando a su familia a salir adelante. Para lograr su objetivo ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 800 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Camilo is 28 years old and married. He lives with his wife and two small children in a farmhouse in the Piura region, four hours from the city of Chiclayo, capital of the Lambeyeque department.

He does jobs related to the raising and selling of animals. He raises sheep and poultry in a few farmyards near his home. He fattens them with natural fodder. Once they have developed enough, he sells them to the public and to traders who visit the area where he lives. This work allows him to help with his family’s household expenses.

Camilo wants to buy balanced diet of food to fatten his animals. Once they are fattened, he wants to sell them and obtain greater earnings which will allow him to continue progressing and helping his family to move forward. To achieve this goal, he thought it was advisable to request a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 800 nuevos soles.

loans.use: to buy a balanced diet of food to fatten his animals

loans.name: María Teodora

texts.es: La señora María Teodora M. V. desde hace varios años se separo de su esposo y quedo a cargo de sus 4 hijos por lo que ha salido adelante para ofrecerles una mejor calidad de vida. En este momento desea construir un cuarto en su vivienda para tener mas espacio y vivir con mayor comodidad. Para esto requiere comprar material de construcción para realizar su proyecto.
texts.en: Mrs. Maria Teodora Medoza V. separated from her husband several years ago, which left her in charge of her 4 children.  She has exerted herself to provide a better quality of life for them.  Right now, she wants to build a room onto her home so they will have more space and live more comfortably.  That's why she wants to buy construction materials to do this project.

loans.use: Begin construction

loans.name: Maximo

texts.es:
Máximo tiene 56 años de edad, es casado y reside junto a su esposa e hijos en uno de los caseríos que conforman el distrito agrícola de Olmos, una zona bastante conocida por producir limón y maracuyá, pertenece a la provincia de Lambayeque y se encuentra situada a más de una hora y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a trabajar en la agricultura, específicamente en el cultivo de limón. El cuenta con una parcela de cultivo en donde cultiva este producto y lo cosecha permanentemente para luego ofrecerlo en venta a los diversos acopiadores de la zona y al público en general. El cuanta con bastante experiencia en el manejo de estos cultivos y siempre se esfuerza por mantener su negocio ya que de el depende el sustento económico de su familia.

Máximo desea adquirir algunos fertilizantes para brindar mantenimiento a su cultivo de modo que pueda asegurarse una buena producción, para lograr su objetivo ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Maximo is 56 years old, is married, and lives with his wife and children in one of the farmhouses in the agricultural district of Olmos; an area well known for producing limes and passion fruit.  It's in the province of Lambayeque and is more than an hour and a half away from the city of Chiclayo.

He works in agriculture, specifically in the cultivation of limes.  He has a parcel of land where he grows them and harvests constantly so he can sell the limes to the various wholesalers in the area, and to the general public.  He has a lot of experience in the management of these crops and always works hard to maintain his business, as he depends on it to support his family.

Maximo would like to acquire some fertilizers to be able to nourish his crops in a way that will secure good production.  To achieve his goal, he has requested 1500 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: Buy fertilizer for the nourishment of crops

loans.name: Ernestina Albertina

texts.es:
Ernestina tiene 49 años de edad, es viuda y reside junto a su familia en el distrito de Olmos, una zona agrícola y comercial que pertenece a la provincia de Lambayeque y que se encuentra situada a más de una hora y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a la comercialización de prendas de vestir para todo público. Ella cuenta con un stock de prendas de vestir que suele adquirir en la ciudad de Chiclayo regularmente. Trabaja en base a pedidos y debido al tiempo que lleva como comerciante se ha vuelto conocida y cuenta con una clientela estable y fidelizada. Los ingresos que le brinda esta actividad le ayudan a solventar sus gastos y apoyar a su familia con su sostenimiento económico.

Ernestina desea adquirir prendas de temporada para implementar su negocio y afrontar la demanda con la que actualmente cuenta. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
Ernestina is 49 years old, is widowed, and lives with her family in the Olmos district, a commercial and agricultural district in the province of Lambayeque.  It's more than an hour and a half away from the city of Chiclayo.

She sells articles of clothing to the public.  She has an inventory that she regularly restocks from the city of Chiclayo.  She works on order and due to the amount of time she has been in this business, she has become well known and has a stable and loyal clientele.  Her income helps cover the costs of the business, and supports her family.  

Ernestina wants to acquire seasonal apparel to add to her business and meet the current demand from her clientele.  That is why she is requesting a loan of 2000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa, to help her reach that goal.

loans.use: Purchase of seasonal apparel for resale

loans.name: Madai Ludim

texts.es:
Madai tiene 18 años de edad, es soltera y reside junto a sus padres en el distrito de Jayanca, una zona agrícola que pertenece a la provincia de Lambayeque y que se encuentra ubicada a más de una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a la comercialización de prendas de vestir para todo público. Ella cuenta con un stock de prendas de vestir que suele adquirir en las ciudades de Chiclayo o Lima regularmente. Trabaja en base a pedidos y debido al tiempo que lleva como comerciante se ha vuelto conocida y cuenta con una clientela estable y fidelizada. Los ingresos que le brinda esta actividad le ayudan a solventar sus gastos y apoyar a su familia con su sostenimiento económico.

Madai desea adquirir prendas de temporada para implementar su negocio y afrontar la demanda con la que actualmente cuenta. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.
texts.en: Madai is 18 years old, single and lives with her parents in the district of Jayanca, an agricultural area in the province of Lambayeque located more than an hour from the city of Chiclayo. She makes a living selling clothing to the entire public. She has a stock of garments that she usually acquires in the cities of Chiclayo and Lima on a regular basis. Her work is based on orders, and as a result of her time in this activity she has become known and has a stable and loyal clientele. Her profits from her work help her cover expenses and support her family financially. Madai wishes to acquire seasonal clothing for her business to meet the demands of her customers. She is requesting a loan of 2000 soles from Kiva partner Edpyme Alternativa to help her achieve this objective.

loans.use: Acquire seasonal clothing for her business.

loans.name: Jimmy

texts.es:
Jimmy es un padre de familia de 31 años de edad que reside junto a su esposa y a sus hijos en una zona urbano marginal del distrito de José Leonardo Ortiz, el sector es una de las localidades más pobladas de la región y se caracteriza por su abundante movimiento comercial y de transporte.

Se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte de carga y pasajeros en una mototaxi (vehículo motorizado consistente en una motocicleta que lleva anexada una cabina para realizar actividades de transporte) el brinda este servicio en las principales calles de su distrito y depende de los ingresos que esta actividad de brinde para sustentar los gastos económicos de su familia.

El continuo uso brindado a su mototaxi y el estado accidentado de los caminos de las zonas que recorre diariamente han hecho que su unidad móvil empiece a sufrir algunos daños que requieren de urgente reparación para garantizar su correcto funcionamiento. Para realizar esta acción ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Jimmy is 31-years old and he lives with his wife and children in a marginal part of the city in a district called Jose Leonardo Ortiz. It is a heavily populated area, and it is known for high traffic in personal and commerical transport.

He drives a mototaxi (a motorcycle with a small cabin in the back to carry passengers or cargo) on the heavily trafficked streets in his district, and he depends on this job to provide for his family's economic needs.

The continued use of his mototaxi and the state of the roads in the area he drives along daily have resulted in his vehicle sustaining some damages that require immediate repairs. In order to make these repairs he has applied for a loan of 1,000 new soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: Repairs for mototaxi

loans.name: Roso Alexander

texts.es:
Roso tiene 25 años de edad, es soltero y reside junto a su familia en el distrito de Olmos, una zona agrícola y comercial que pertenece a la provincia de Lambayeque y que se encuentra situada a más de una hora y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

El cuenta con una pequeña bodega instalada en su domicilio, allí el ofrece a sus clientes diversos productos de uso diario entre productos de primera necesidad y abarrotes. Su negocio cuenta son mucha acogida debido a la calidad de productos que ofrece y a la buena atención que suele brindar. Los ingresos que percibe de estas actividades los utiliza para solventar sus gastos personales y ayudar al desarrollo económico de su familia.

Roso desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de más productos de modo que pueda satisfacer la demanda con la que cuenta actualmente. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su meta.
texts.en:
Roso is 25-years old, single, and lives with his family in the district of Olmas, a agricultural area that belongs to the province of Lambayeque, which is located about an hour and half from the city of Chiclayo.

He has a small general store installed in his house. He offers his clients a variety of daily products including snack foods and first aid materials. His business has been well received because the quality of products he offers and the good service he provides. He uses his businesses profits to pay for his personal expenses and help his family's economic situation. 

Roso hopes to grow his business by buying popular products that will meet his current demand. To fulfill this goal he has applied for a loan of 2,000 new soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: Increase the quality and variety of products in his store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase of this season's clothing for her store

loans.name: Miguel

texts.es:
Miguel tiene 28 años de edad, es casado y reside con su familia en uno de los caseríos agrícolas de Tambogrande, que pertenece a la región Piura, a 4 horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital del departamento de Lambayeque. 

Se dedica a trabajar en actividades relacionadas con la crianza y venta de animales. El cría ganado ovino y aves de corral en algunos corrales situados cerca a su domicilio, los engorda alimentándoles de pastos naturales y cuando estos ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta al público en general  y a los negociantes que suelen visitar la zona en donde reside. Esta actividad le permite ayudar al sostenimiento de la economía de su familia.

Miguel desea comprar alimento balanceado para engordar a sus animales, y una vez que estén desarrollados venderlos y así obtener mayores ganancias que le permitan seguir progresando y ayudando a su familia a salir adelante. Para lograr su objetivo ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Miguel is 28 years old.  He is married and lives with his family in one of the agricultural villages of Tambogrande, in Piura region, four hours from the city of Chiclayo, capital of Lambayeque department.

Manuel raises and sells animals.  He raises sheep and poultry in some pens located near his home.  He fattens them, feeding them natural fodder and, when they have raised a good level of development, he offers them for sale to the general public and the traders who normally visit his area.  This business allows him to help support his family financially.

Miguel would like to buy balanced animal feed to fatten his animals and, once they have reached an appropriate level of development, he will sell them, thereby making bigger profits which will allow him to continue making progress and helping his family to get ahead in life.  In order to achieve his goal, he is requesting a loan for 1,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: To buy balanced animal feed to fatten his animals

loans.name: Pedro Cesar

texts.es:
Pedro tiene 28 años de edad, es soltero y reside con sus padres en un barrio de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital del departamento de Lambayeque. 

Se dedica a la venta de productos plásticos descartables, como vasos, bolsas, platos y similares. Compra su mercadería en el mercado mayorista de Moshoqueque y lo vende en pueblos anexos a Chiclayo, como Ucupe, Mocupe, Cayalti, Nueva Arica,  Chepén Olmos y otros. Su mercadería la vende al contado y al crédito.  Esta actividad la realiza con la finalidad de incrementar sus ingresos y apoyar la economía de su familia

Pedro desea comprar más mercadería que al venderlos le generen mayores ganancias que le permitan seguir progresando y ayudando a su familia a salir adelante. Para lograr su objetivo ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Pedro is 28, single, and lives with his parents in the city of Chiclayo, the capital of the department of Lambayeque.

He works selling disposable plastic products like cups, plates, and similar products. He buys his merchandise in the Moshoqueque wholesale market and he sells his products in nearby towns like Ucupe, Mocupe, Cayalti, Nueva Arica, Chepen Olmos, and others. He sells his product for cash or credit. This job helps him earn an income that supports his family economically.

Pedro wants to buy more merchandise so his higher sales volume will result in a higher income, and he can help provide for his family. In order to reach his goals he has applied for a loan of 2,000 new soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: Purchase of merchandise

loans.name: Madres Laboriosas Group

texts.es: La Mirtha tiene 59 años y está casada, tiene 3 hijos y lleva 5 años trabajando con Edaprospo en el grupo “Madres Laboriosas”, grupo conformado por 7 vecinos y amigos. Beatriz trabaja vendiendo dulces, tortas, queques, bocaditos y todo lo que sea repostería, ella manda sus productos a pedido de sus clientes y lleva 9 años trabajando en esto por lo que dice que les gusta mucho a sus clientes los postres que hace con mucho cariño. Ella desea poner su fuente de soda en el futuro y para esto desea que Edaprospo le ayude con sus habilitaciones.
texts.en:
Mirtha is 59 years old, married, has 3 children, and has been working with Edaprospo in the group, "Madres Laboriosas" (Working Mothers) for 5 years; a group comprised of 7 neighbors and friends.  
Beatriz works selling candy, sandwiches, snacks, and anything that is pastries.  She makes her products based on her customers orders which they like very much since she makes them with love and has been doing it for 9 years.  She wishes to install a soda fountain in the future and for this she wishes that Edaprospo's ratings will help her.

loans.use: Purchase goods and supplies

loans.name: Jessica Milagros

texts.es:
Jessica tiene 25 años de edad, soltera, vive en casa de sus padres.  Ella y su familia residen en Chiclayo, capital del Departamento de Lambayeque.

Se dedica a elaborar artesanía.  La cliente cuenta que realiza esta actividad desde que tenía 10 años de edad, y por F. los pedidos se incrementan.  Con la trayectoria que tiene en la elaboración de estos productos, en la actualidad cuenta con una clientela fidelizada que desea obtener cada vez más productos de diferentes diseños.

Jessica necesita comprar insumos para elaborar más artesanias para después comercializarlos y satisfacer la gran demanda que tiene en la actualidad.  Es por ello que ha creido conveniente obtener un préstamo de 1600 nuevos soles en Edpyme Alternativa, el cual sería el segundo crédito en la institución.
texts.en:
Jessica is a 25-year-old single woman who lives with her parents. She and her family live in Chiclayo, the capital city of the department of Lambayeque.

She works making handicrafts. Her customers say that she has been doing this work since she was ten years old. Around holidays, the number of orders increases. Given her long career making these products, she currently has a loyal group of customers. These customers always want more new products with different designs.

Jessica needs to purchase materials in order to make more handicrafts in order to then sell them and satisfy the large demand she is experiencing. This is why she has requested a loan of 1,600 Peruvian nuevos soles through Edpyme Alternativa. This will be her second loan through this institution.

loans.use: Purchase of materials in order to make more handicrafts.

loans.name: Amigas Unidas Group

texts.es: La Señora Esperanza tiene 61 años y vive en la zona “A” de Huaycan, está separada y tiene 3 hijos ya mayores de edad, ella forma parte del grupo “Amigas Unidas”, grupo que lleva 2 años trabajando con Edaprospo y conformado por 9 socias vecinas y amigas. Esperanza ah trabajado por 20 años de costurera y ah podido apoyar a sus hijos cuando eran muy jóvenes, últimamente han logrado construir el techo de su casa y ella se siente contenta con esto, pero desde hace 4 años sufre de diabetes, mas no por esto se rinde y sabe que lograra alcanzar sus metas con su esfuerzo y la ayuda de Edaprospo.
texts.en: Señora Esperanza is 61 and lives in Area "A" of Huaycán. She is separated and has three grown-up children. She is a member of "Amigas Unidas Group" (United Friends), which has been working for 2 years with the microfinance institution Edaprospo. The group has 9 members; they are neighbors and friends. Esperanza has worked for 20 years as a seamstress and was able to support her children when they were very young. Recently she managed to build the roof of her house and this makes her happy. However, she has now suffered from diabetes for 4 years, but it doesn't deter her and she knows that she can achieve her goals thanks to her effort and the support of Edaprospo.

loans.use: To buy supplies for her sewing business

loans.name: Irma Isabel

texts.es:
Irma tiene 57 años de edad, divorciada, tiene 3 hijos que ahora son profesionales ya que ella con mucho esfuerzo trabajó para sacarlos adelante.  Tienen una pequeña casa ubicada en Chiclayo, capital del Departamento de Lambayeque.

Se dedica a la repostería desde hace 20 años, y todos los productos que ella prepara lo hace en un espacio exclusivo para esta actividad dentro de su casa.  Ella tiene muy buena sazón, por lo que cuenta actualmente con clientes que buscan deleitarse con sus postres.

Irma quiere comprar más insumos y poder preparar más postres y pasteles, para satisfacer la gran demanda que tiene, así maximizar sus ventas y obtener mayores ingresos por ellas.  Es por eso que ha creído conveniente obtener un préstamo de 2000 nuevos soles en Edpyme Alternativa para lograr su objetivo.  Ella ya ha tenido 2 créditos en nuestra entidad y ha cumplido puntualmente en sus pagos.
texts.en:
Irma is 57, divorced, and has 3 children who are now professionals because she has worked very hard to get them ahead. They have a small house in Chiclayo, the capital of the Lambayeque Department.

She has been a baker for 20 years, and she makes all of her products in a space in her home dedicated exclusively to this activity. Her products are very tasty, so she has many customers looking to delight in her pastries.

Irma wants to buy more supplies and to be able to prepare more desserts and cakes in order to satisfy the great demand for her products. This will allow her to maximize her sales and make a better income. Thus, she has decided to request a loan of 2000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa in order to achieve her goal. She has already had two loans with the institution, and has punctually completed her payments.

loans.use: to purchase more supplies.

loans.name: Juana Maribel

texts.es:
Juana tiene 35 años, es casada y tiene 2 hijos.  Vive con su familia en el distrito de Santa Rosa, distrito de Chiclayo, capital del Departamento de Lambayeque.

Se dedica a la venta de pescado dentro de terminal pesquero de su zona, esta actividad la realiza desde hace 06 años  aprendió esta actividad de sus padres, es decir conoce a la perfección la actividad. Cuentan con clientela ya establecida en la zona que la estiman y la apoyan.

Juana quiere comprar más pescado, ya que por fiestas, aumentan los pedidos de su clientela, incrementar sus ventas y ganancias, de esta manera sacar adelante a su familia.  Para lograr su objetivo, Juana ha creido conveniente obtener un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles en Edpyme Alternativa, el mismo que sería el cuarto crédito con la entidad.
texts.en:
Juana is 35 years old; she's married and has two children. She lives with her family in the Santa Rosa district, district of Chiclayo, capital of the Department of Lambayeque.

She sells fish at the local fishing station. She has been doing this for six years. She learned the business from her parents, which is to say that she knows the business perfectly. She has an established local clientele who admire and support her.

Juana wants to buy more fish because due to the festivals her customers' orders increase, which increases her sales and earnings. In this way she can help her family move forward. To meet her goal, Juana hopes to get a loan of 1,500 nuevos soles from Kiva partner Edpyme Alternativa. This will be her fourth loan through this organization.

loans.use: Purchase more merchandise

loans.name: Kerimbay

texts.en:
Kerimbay T. is 54 years old, married and has six children. After graduating from college, he served in the army in Siberia, Russia.  Kerimbay has lived with and is happily married to his wife for more than 25 years and recently became a grandfather of an 11-month old child. Now, he works as a driver at the local government office but his wages don't cover all the expenses of his large family. In his area of the country, cattle breeding and land cultivating are main activities which generate profits.   Kerimbay decided to engage in livestock breeding. His wife and elder son are the main helpers to him in this activity. 

He started this business with 20,000 KGS and with the revenues from it, started to cultivate wheat on the plot of land. Now, Kerimbay plans to use this loan of 50,000 KGS to buy two bull-calves for fattening and seeds of the wheat crops.. It will allow him to increase his sales of wheat in the future and increase his variety of meat products. Kerimbay is a very positive and hard-working person, who believes that his efforts will lead his family to a prosperous future. 

Bai-Tushum and Partners uses Kiva funding to target the especially vulnerable population. Bai-Tushum and Partners is one of the leading Microfinance Institutions in Kyrgyzstan. As a reliable financial partner, Bai-Tushum contributes to the economic development of the Kyrgyz Republic through the delivery of microfinance services in rural and urban areas that lead to increased employment and meet the interests of its clients and investors.

loans.use: to buy cattle and seed

loans.name: Natividad

texts.en:
Natividad is from the city of Dipolog. She is 59 years old, married and has one adult child. Natividad owns & operates a vegetable selling business. She has been engaged in her business for over three years and earns approximately 3,000 PHP a month.

In 2006, Natividad joined PMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. She has successfully repaid a previous loan of 9,000 PHP from PMPC. This previous loan was used to invest in expanding her business. Natividad is requesting a new loan of 4,000 PHP which will be used to purchase vegetables and spices. This will be her 7th loan from PMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated to make improvements to her house.

About PMPC:
Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC) is one of the most progressive cooperatives in northwestern Mindanao. It reaches out to the rural poor using the Grameen model.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva. Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables and spices

loans.name: Fedie

texts.en:
Fedie P. is from the city of Ozamiz. He is 30 years old, married and has one school-aged child and two infants.

Fedie owns and operates a transportation business. He has been engaged in this business for over three years and earns approximately 6,000 PHP a month.

In December 2010, Fedie joined PMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve his living situation and his ability to engage in business activities. 

Fedie is requesting a new loan of 20,000 PHP which will be used to pay for his motorcycle. He plans to use the additional revenue generated to save as a reserve for future emergencies.

About PMPC:

loans.name: Altynbubu

texts.en:
Altynbubu K. is 59 years old and is widowed. She has four grown children; her youngest son lives with her and helps in the household. 
Altynbubu got married and had lived with her husband in a happy marriage for a long time but, unfortunately, in 2000 her husband died of heart disease.
 
To find additional means of income, she decided to continue the business of cattle breeding which was started by her deceased husband. Due to their vast experience in this activity, Altynbubu’s family managed to maintain the farm with 10 sheep and bull calves. In 2009, her son sold most of their cattle and bought a truck, which is now used in a transportation service by him. 

Now Altynbubu is applying for a loan of 100,000 Kyrgyz Soms to buy two cows and spares to repair the truck. Altynbubu is an optimistic woman and believes that her tireless efforts will lead her family to a more prosperous life. 

Bai-Tushum and Partners uses Kiva funding to target the especially vulnerable population. Bai-Tushum and Partners is one of the leading Microfinance Institutions in Kyrgyzstan. As a reliable financial partner, Bai-Tushum contributes to the economic development of the Kyrgyz Republic through the delivery of microfinance services in rural and urban areas that lead to increased employment and meet the needs of its clients and investors.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Kanybek

texts.en:
Kanybek T. was born and raised in the Republic of Tajikistan. He grew up in a large family and, from early childhood, he helped his parents in the household. 

In 1997, Kanybek moved with his family to Kyrgyzstan. Using the money they had earned, his family bought a house and Kanybek started to work at the local state farm as a driver. In 2004, he got married and became the father of three children. To find additional means of subsistence for his family, Kanybek decided to engage in cattle breeding. Using his starting capital of 6,000 KGS, he managed to raise his floating capital and earn 12,000 KGS monthly. 

Today, his farm has three calves and two milk cows and still needs to be developed. Kanybek, therefore, plans to use this loan of 60,000 KGS to increase the number of cattle on his farm. Eventually, Kanybek plans to provide higher education for his children and to build a house for his family. As a very purposeful and positive person, Kanybek works hard to support his family and provide them with a prosperous future.

loans.name: Hassan T.

texts.en:
This is 40 year-old Hassan T. C.. He is married and has four children ages 3, 6, 10 and 12. In 2007, Hassan established his essential drugs business. He began his business because he wanted to be self-employed. Working six days a week and seven hours a day, he earns about 500,000 SLL every month. He needs a loan of 3,000,000 SLL.

Hassan has already received and successfully repaid one loan and now requires a new loan in order to purchase more essential drugs. He hopes that this loan will enable him to increase his monthly profits by approximately 400,000 SLL. In the future, Hassan plans to open a big store and sell in wholesale to other traders. He would also like to educate his children to university level and construct a home for his family. He thanks you for your support.

loans.name: Urumkan

texts.en:
Urumkan O. is a 55-year-old widow who lives in Saruu village, in the northeast of Kyrgyzstan. She has two grown children who had to leave for Russia in order to find jobs. After graduating college, she worked as a seamstress at the local plant and was characterized as a very accurate and hardworking person. Her husband was the person who went through all the hardships of life with her, but in 2010 she became the only parent for her children. It was a hard blow for Urumkan, but she didn’t give in and did her best to support her children. Now she is also bringing up her two grandchildren. 

Eighteen years ago, Urumkan and her family started a business of cattle-breeding and earned their living through selling milk and milk products. She concentrated all her efforts on supporting and expanding her household. For this very reason, Urumkan now wants to take out a loan of 35,000 KGS to buy one milk cow. With the revenue from this investment, Urumkan plans to renovate her house. In the future, Urumkan plans to develop her farm by means of livestock breeding.

Bai-Tushum and Partners uses Kiva funding to target the especially vulnerable population. Bai-Tushum and Partners is one of the leading Micro-finance Institutions in Kyrgyzstan. As a reliable financial partner, Bai-Tushum contributes to the economic development of the Kyrgyz Republic through the delivery of micro-finance services in rural and urban areas that lead to increased employment and meet the interests of its clients and investors.

loans.name: Taalaybek

texts.en:
Taalaybek M. is 45 years old, married and has one son and one daughter. He grew up in a large family with 8 children and from early childhood, he had to help his parents with the household. After serving in the army in Siberia (Russia), Taalaybek returned home and began to work as a tractor driver. After he got married, he stayed in his parents’ house in accordance with the ancient Kyrgyz tradition of taking care of one's elderly parents.

In order to support his family, Taalaybek decided to engage in cattle breeding and farming. With the initial sum of 4,000 KGS for purchasing cattle, he managed to enlarge his farm and earn about 9,000 KGS monthly. In 2004, Taalaybek held his daughter’s wedding and gained a son-in-law, which further increased his family's expenses. Taalaybek plans to use this loan of 50,000 KGS to increase his number of cattle. In the future, Taalaybek plans to provide higher education to his son and build a house for his family.

Bai-Tushum and Partners uses Kiva funding to target the especially vulnerable population. Bai-Tushum and Partners is one of the leading microfinance institutions in Kyrgyzstan. loans.name: Aigul

texts.en:
Aigul M. is 49, married and has three grown children. She was born in the south of the country, but in order to find better conditions to live in for her children, her family decided to move to Ozernoe village, in the suburb of the capital city Bishkek. 

There, in 2000, they bought a house and started their business in land cultivating. Aigul and her husband worked hard and managed to cultivate a sort of potatoes that came into great demand at the local markets. 

In 2007, Aigul decided to move to Besh-Terek village, where cattle breeding is successfully developed. Aigul left her house and business in land cultivating to her elder son, Ulan, and to his family.
  
Now Aigul and her husband are engaged in cattle breeding and they maintain a farm with three milk cows and two bull calves. She started this business with the initial capital of 10,000 KGS and manages to earn 9,000 KGS in a month. 

Now Aigul wants to develop her farm and for this reason, she applies for a loan of 80,000 KGS. With the revenues, she plans to renovate her house.

texts.es: La señora Melvy nacida en la Guardia el 3 de enero, casada y con 3 hijos,  su esposo es contratista de albañil actividad donde le va muy bien ya que muchos contratos por su responsabilidad y la señora Melvy trabaja en la agricultura con peones para la siembra de maíz, arroz, yuca también se dedica a la compra y venta de cítrico como decir naranja, achachairu. Ella trabaja en Sombrerito tiene su parcela de su padre ellos no usaban la tierra y como ellos no lo trabajan ella aprovecho la oportunidad para trabajar en esas tierras, después comercializan sus productos en el mercado de el Torno, el dinero del crédito lo utilizara para la compra de semillas y también para el pago a los peones por el trabajo de preparado de la tierras, es una persona muy trabajadora y esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Mrs Melvy, was born in La Guardia on January 3rd. She is married and has 3 children. Her husband is a building contractor, and it is going very well for him, as he has many contracts due to his responsibility. Mrs Melvy works in agriculture with farmhands, sowing corn, rice and yucca. She also buys and sells citrus fruits such as oranges and  achachairu. She works in Sombrerito. She has a plot of land from her parents, which they were not using--so she took advantage of the opportunity to work these lands. She sells her products in the El Torno market. She will use the money from this loan for the purchase of seeds and also to pay the workers for their work preparing the land. She is a very hard-working person and is grateful to the institution for the support offered.

loans.use: for the sowing of rice

loans.name: Grover

texts.es: El Señor Grover dedicado al servicio de transporte en taxi ya hace años atrás necesita este crédito para la instalación de agua potable en su humilde casa que durante estos últimos años lo fue construyendo de a poco, con los ahorros de cada mes, privándose de muchas cosas personales, esto lo realiza para poder brindar una mejor comodidad a sus queridos papas. El sueño del joven es tener una casa cómoda con servicios básicos, es un joven muy responsable y trabajador que esta agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Mr Grover has offered a taxi transportation service for several years. He needs this loan to install potable water in his modest home, which he has been building bit by bit for several years now with his monthly savings, giving up many personal items in the process. He is doing this in order to be able to provide his beloved parents with greater comfort. This young man's dream is to have a comfortable home with basic services. He is a very responsible and hard-working youth who is grateful to the institution for the support offered.

loans.use: the installation of potable water in his home

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es: El señor Carlos nacido en Chuquisaca casado y tiene 3 hijos hace 20 años que el vive y trabaja en Sombrerito a 8 km de la guardia el trabaja agricultura también se dedica a la venta de achachairu, mandarina y naranja después comercializan sus productos en el mercado de el Torno y la Guardia, su esposa le ayuda en la comercialización de sus productos, el dinero del crédito lo utilizara para la compra de semillas, plantas de cítricos  y también para el pago a los peones por el trabajo de preparado de la tierras, es una persona muy trabajadora y esta agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Sr. Carlos was born in Chuquisaca.  He is married and has 3 children.  He has lived and worked in Sombrerito, some 8 km from La Guardia, for 20 years.  He operates a farming business.  He also sells achachairu, mandarins and oranges in the markets at Torno and La Guardia.  His wife helps him sell the produce.  He will use this loan to buy seeds for planting citrus fruits and to pay a laborer to help him prepare his fields.  Sr. Carlos is a hard-working man and he's grateful to the institution for the support it provides.

loans.use: Buy citrus plants for farming business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Reposicion por Compra de Vehiculo

loans.name: Marta Auxiliadora

texts.es:
Marta es una mujer trabajadora, con 52 años de edad, hoy en día labora  a una empresa privada como calificador de póliza de seguro en donde lleva varios años en el cargo y que gracias a sus ahorros ha logrado cubrir todos sus gastos como: alimentación, gastos básicos, gastos personales y apoyo  a sus hijos.
Con este préstamo quiere enverjar y asegurar puertas y ventana en su casa de habitación, lo que para ella es de gran relevancia esta mejora. Ya que se le metieron a robar lo que le causo una gran impresión ya que con mucho esfuerzo ha comprado sus artículos. 
Los materiales  a comprar es: soldadura, varillas de hierro, pintura anticorrosiva, cemento, arena, para hacer esta mejora.
texts.en: Marta is a hard-working woman, age 52. She currently works for a private company as an insurance policy qualifier. She has had this job for several years, and thanks to her savings she has been able to cover all of her costs such as: food, basic costs, personal costs, and support for her children. She wants to use this loan to strengthen and secure the doors and windows in her home. This improvement is very important for her, as she has been robbed. This has had a strong effect on her, since she had purchased her possessions with a lot of hard work. The materials that she will buy are: a solder, iron bars, non-corrosive paint, cement, and sand for this improvement.

loans.use:
She will purchase construction materials such as: cement, sand,
iron bars, and paint to secure her door and windows

loans.name: Isidoro

texts.es:
Isidoro es  un padre de familia muy dedicado a trabajar para dar el apoyo económico  a sus hijos. 
Trabaja como cadete de taxi, siendo el propietario, el cual mediante de venta de herramientas de mecánica logro el vehículo. En donde recorre todos los días. Teniendo careras buenas y regular.
Cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa quien vende comida. Por medio de Afodenic ha venido logrando las mejoras a su vivienda con  financiamientos otorgados a plazos. Con esta nueva solicitud comprara materiales de construcción para hacer división a cuartos y cocina.
texts.en:
Isidoro is a father who is very dedicated to working in order to provide his children with economic support.
He works as a taxi driver, and was able to buy his vehicle through selling mechanical tools. He works every day and has good and regular fares. He counts on the support of his wife, who sells food. Through Afodenic, he has been able to make improvements to his home with loans authorized in installments. He will use this new loan to buy construction materials to put up divisions in the rooms and the kitchen.

loans.use: He will put up a division in his kitchen and rooms, and use the loan to purchase construction materials to do the work

loans.name: Rose Mary

texts.es: La señora Rose Mary F. B. es madre soltera tiene 5 hijos y viven en la zona del plan  3000 barrio 15 de mayo al sudeste del plan, ella solo se hace cargo de el hijo de 3 años,  la señora trabajaba realizando limpieza y tejiendo  en su casa, y conel tiempo fue adquiriendo mas clientes, ahora tiene mucha demanda y se ha comprado una maquina de tejido mas grande y le esta yendo mejor por esa razón solicita una nuevo crédito para poder comprar mas material  y seguir tejiendo ropa de verano y ropa de invierno. La Sra Rose Mary esta muy agradecida con todas la persona que le apoyaron y confiaron en ella ahora les pide que sigan trabajando con ella, que vuelvan a confiar en ella.
texts.en: Sra. Rose Mary F. B. is a single mother with 5 children.  She lives in Plan 3000, a neighborhood on the southeast side of the Bolivian city of Santa Cruz.  Her 3-year old son is still in her care.  She has long made a living at home, cleaning and making clothes.  She has picked up customers over time and can now count on a good customer base for her clothing.  She bought a larger knitting machine and her business is improving.  She wants to apply for a new loan so that she can buy materials and continue making clothing for both summer and winter.  Sra. Rose Mary is grateful to everyone who has supported and trusted her.  She asks that you trust her again now and continue working with her.

loans.use: Working capital for tailoring business.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.es: El Sr. Daniel nacido el 25 de febrero  en Santa Cruz vive en Sombrerito tiene su parcela que trabaja agricultura también se dedica al siembra de plantas de cítrico como ser naranja, mandarina, achachairu el tiene 3 hijos pero todavía son pequeños, su esposa es ama de casa que esta al cuidado de sus hijos, ella se  dedica a la venta de achachairu, mandarina y naranja después comercializan sus productos en el mercado de el Torno y la Guardia, el dinero del crédito lo utilizara para la compra de semillas, plantas de cítricos  y también para el pago a los peones por el trabajo de preparado de la tierras, es una persona muy trabajadora y esta agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Mr. Daniel was born February 25th in Santa Cruz and lives in Sombrerito where he has agricultural land. He also works planting citrus trees such as oranges, tangerines and achachairu. He has three children who are still small. His wife is a housewife and cares for the children. She works selling the achachairu, tangerines and oranges and later they market the products in the markets in Torno and Guardia. The money from this loan will be used to buy seeds, citrus plants and also to pay laborers to prepare the lands. Mr. Daniel is a very hardworking person and is grateful with the institution for offering help.

loans.use: To buy citrus plants

loans.name: Heydi Patricia

texts.es:
Heydi es una pequeña comerciante, que gracias al empeño y trabajo ha venido logrando mejores utilidades en su trabajo. 
Su negocio es la venta de lubricantes y auto lavado, en donde ha invertido en más productos de lubricantes gracias al financiamiento que Afodenic, dio.
Hay día en que las ventas son bajas, pero no se deja de vender, aun vive con sus padres quienes han apoyado en todo hasta ahora, lo que es para ella una gran satisfacción.
Con este nuevo financiamiento comprara lubricantes y filtros para seguir obteniendo mejores venta. Como objetivo es aumentar su inventario cada dia para fortalecer su negocio.
texts.en:
Heydi is a small-scale merchant. Thanks to her dedication and work, she has been making better profits from her work.
Her business is selling lubricants and washing cars. She has invested in more lubricants thanks to this loan from Afodenic. There are times when sales are low, but she hasn't stopped selling. She still lives with her parents, who have always supported her in everything. She is very grateful for this.
She will use this new loan to purchase lubricants and filters in order to keep making better sales. Her goal is to increase her inventory every day in order to strengthen her business.

loans.use: She will invest in lubricants and filters, which she sells in her carwash business.

loans.name: Ivette Sorayda

texts.es:
Ivette es madre de un hijo, casada, con un pequeño negocio que inicio hace cuatro años, una pulpería y variedades con poca mercadería empezó con dinero que su esposo dio, productos de su trabajo en sistemas.
Es el segundo ciclo en Afodenic, el cual ha logrado mejores niveles de ventas, al incrementar su inventario gracias a los financiamientos otorgados. 
Con este nuevo préstamo, desea ampliar el local de la pulpería, ya que tiene como objetivo la puesta de un cafetín en donde venderá repostería, café, comida y producto de su pulpería, logrando ampliar más el negocio como mejores márgenes de ventas.
texts.en:
Ivette is the mother of one. She is married and has a small business that she started four years ago - a store that sells a variety of merchandise. She started with some money that her husband gave her, which came from his work in systems.

This is her second loan with Kiva partner Afodenic, which has helped her increase her sales by increasing her inventory, thanks to the loans that were authorized. With this new loan she wants to expand her store. Her goal is to open a cafe where she will sell desserts, coffee, meals, and products from her store, thus growing her business and creating better sales margins.

loans.use: Purchase construction materials to expand her store so she can open a cafe and sell more products

loans.name: Severo

texts.es: El Sr. Severo vive en San Carlos a 25 km del Torno donde trabaja y vive juntamente con su esposa y sus hijos, siembran maíz, sandia, poroto y todo lo que cosecha saca a vender al mercado de el Torno, el es de Cochabamba se vino a buscar mejores vida y lo encontró en San Carlos mediante el sindicato agrario tiene su parcela en la cual esta trabajando, este es su primer crédito, lo utilizara para la compra de semillas, y también para el pago a los peones por el trabajo de preparado de la tierras, es una persona muy trabajadora y esta agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Mr. Severo lives in San Carlos, 25 km from El Torno where he works. He lives with his wife and children. They plant corn, watermelon and beans. They take everything that they harvest to sell in the El Torno market. He is from Cochabamba and came in search of a better life, which he found in San Carlos. Through the agricultural syndicate, he has his own land which he works. This is his first loan, and he will use it to buy seeds and also to pay the workers for their work preparing the lands. He is a very hard-working person and is grateful to the institution for the support offered.

loans.use: for sowing corn

loans.name: Omar

texts.en:
Omar is a 47-year-old father of three daughters and one son. His daughters are 20, 19, and 16, while his son is 21. Omar has a store in the city of Gaza in Gaza Strip, and he wants to start selling clothes, which will secure the family a good income.

Omar took out a $2,000 loan from FATEN to purchase the needed clothes and start selling them in his store. Omar's son Mahmoud will help him running the store.

Omar appears in the picture here in FATEN's office.

loans.use: To purchase children's clothes to sell in the store

loans.name: Adela Del Carmen

texts.es:
Adela del Carmen Chávez es una fémina trabajadora, esforzada y emprendedora de 22 años quien con su mamá puso una pequeña pulpería y tortillería negocio que ha ido progresando poco a poco. Esta joven soltera con dos pequeño de 9 y 5 años por los cuales trabaja arduamente de sol a sol tiene la meta con ampliar su negocio convirtiéndola en una distribuidora y terminar su casa.

Chávez invertirá el crédito en la ampliación de la tortillería y en útiles escolares ya que tiene mucha demanda en esta época.
texts.en: Adela del Carmen Chávez is a hardworking, enterprising 22-year-old woman who has started a small grocery store and tortilla shop with her mother. The business has been growing little by little. This single young woman has two children, 9- and 5-years-old. It is for them she works hard from sunrise to sunset. She has a goal of growing her business and becoming a distributor, and of finishing her house. Chávez will invest her loan in the expansion of the tortilla shop and of school supplies, since she has had a lot of demand this season.

loans.use: Expansion of the tortilla shop, school supplies

loans.name: Ana Rosa

texts.es:
Ana  es una mujer trabajadora para apoyar  a su familia. Con un pequeño negocio de venta de ropa usada y costura, teniendo varios años que inicio por iniciativa propia y para el sustento de cada día.
Vende en su casa de habitación, en donde ha logrado captar clientes, comenzando solo con la costura, y luego con préstamos en la institución por medio del financiamiento, en donde compro pacas para lograr obtener mejores utilidades.
Con este nuevo préstamo será utilizado en la compra de mercancías para hacer ropa nueva de costura rápida, y la compra de dos pacas.
texts.en:
Ana is a hardworking woman who supports her family with a small business that sells used and tailored clothing. It has been years since she started the business out of her own initiative for daily (economic) support.

She sells out of her home, where she has come to build up a clientele, starting only with the tailored clothes, and later with loans from this organization she bought packs of clothing in order to generate better profits.

With this new loan she will buy merchandise for making new clothes quickly as well as two packs of used clothes.

loans.use: Purchase materials for clothesmaking and two packs of used clothing to increase sales.

loans.name: Miriam Victoria

texts.es:
Miriam Victoria C. es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora quien es propietaria de una pequeña pulpería la cual inicio con la venta de gaseosas y chiverías. Ella con la ayuda de sus hijos puso este pequeño negocio el cual gracias a los préstamos y la ardua labor de ella, su nuera y nieto ha ido creciendo.

La meta de C. de 64 años desea aumentar su negocio hasta convertirla en una miscelánea.
texts.en: Miriam Victoria C. is a hardworking and enterprising woman who owns a small grocery shop which she began by selling soft drinks and snacks.  She established the business with the help of her children, and thanks to loans and the hard work by her, her daughter-in- law, and her grandson it has grown.  Carillo, age 64, wants to enlarge her business until it is converted into a general store.

loans.use: To purchase dried grains, snacks, and school supplies.

loans.name: María Elsa

texts.es:
María Elsa P. García es una mujer trabajadora, esforzada y emprendedora de 56 años quien se dedica al comercio de ropa el cual inicio de granito en granito es decir con unos cuantos estilos de ropa en la actualidad compra y distribuye mayor cantidad de este producto. P. es casada y tiene un hijo ya mayor de edad quien le ayuda en el negocio.

Ella invertirá el crédito en mercadería como camisas, pantalones, blusas, jeans, camisetas, en especial uniformes ya que inician las clases.
texts.en:
María Elsa P. García is a hardworking and enterprising 56-year-old woman who puts a lot of effort into her work. She works selling clothing which she started little by little with a few styles of clothing, and currently buys and distributes a larger quantity of merchandise. Mrs. P. is married and has an adult son who helps her in the business.

She will invest the loan in merchandise like shirts, pants, blouses, jeans, T-shirts, and uniforms especially because classes are beginning.

loans.use: Merchandise

loans.name: Francis Janethe

texts.es:
La señora Francis Janethe P. Zúniga es una mujer trabajadora, esforzada y emprendedora quien vende ropa interior, cosméticos desde hace diez años  y hace dos año inicio con  un pequeño kiosco en un colegio.  Ella tiene siete años de trabajar con Adim en los cuales su negocios han ido creciendo y desarrollando.

P. de 37 años madre de tres hijos de 22, 14 y 10 años invertirá el crédito en ropa interios (blúmer, hilos, bikinis, brasier, fajas etc. y en productos para el kiosko ya que se acerca el regreso a clases.
texts.en:
Francis Janethe P. Zúniga is a hardworking woman, motivated and entrepreneurial. She has been selling undergarments and cosmetics for 10 years. Two years ago she opend up a small stand at a school. She has been working with Kiva partner Adim for sevenn years, during which time her businesses have been growing and developing.

She is 37 years old and the mother of three children, who are 22, 14, and 10 years old. She will invest this loan in undergarments (bloomers, thongs, bikinis, bras, girdles, etc.) as well as in merchandise for the stand since it is nearing the time when school will be back in session.

loans.use: Clothes and merchandise for the stand

loans.name: Shalon Group

texts.es:
El grupo Shalon lo conforman tres personas trabajadoras, esforzadas y emprendedoras una de ellas es Manuela A. de 60 años quien se dedica al comercio de ropa y de productos Avon además los fines de semana vende nacatamales y sopa de res. Ella inicio este negocio con usura cero y luego para mejorarlo inicio a prestar en Adim. 

A. tiene 8 hijos todos ya mayores de edad y su meta es aumentar su negocio.

Las otras integrantes del grupo son Keila Patricia N. Martínez de 19 años quien vende ropa y Leonci L.  quien vende ropa interior lovable.
texts.en:
The Shalon group is made up of three hard-working and enterprising people, one of whom is Manuela A., age 60, who sells clothing and Avon products. Furthermore, on the weekends she sells nactamales and res soup. She started this business without any loans, and later took out a loan with Adim in order to improve it.

 A. has 8 grown children, and her goal is to expand her business. The other group members are Keila Patricia N. Martinez, age 19, who sells clothing, and Leonci L., who sells Lovable underwear.

loans.use: in clothing

loans.name: Mujeres Victoriosas Group

texts.es:
El grupo Mujeres Victoriosas está conformado por tres mujeres trabajadoras, esforzadas y emprendedoras una de ellas es Ana L. de 54 años se dedica al comercio de ropa usada desde hace 20 años negocio que inicio con poco y gracias a los préstamos y su ardua labor fue creciendo con lo cual pudo sacar adelante a sus tres hijos.

Las otras integrantes de grupo está son Guadalupe H. de 57 años quien vende gaseosa y repostería desde hace 15 años y Concepción H. quien vende ropa usada y repostería.
texts.en: The Mujeres Victoriosas (Victorious Women) group is made up of three, hardworking, dedicated, and enterprising women.  One of them is Ana L., age 54, who is engaged in the business of selling used clothing.  She began this business 20 years ago with very little and thanks to loans and hard work it has grown so that she and her three children have been able to progress.  The other members of the group are Guadalupe H., age 57, who has sold soft drinks and pastries for 15 years, and Concepción H., who sells used clothing and pastries.

loans.use: To purchase bales of used clothing.

loans.name: Jader Antonio

texts.es: Jader de 30 años de edad es casado, tiene 2 hijos, el mayor de 5 añitos y el menor de 2 meses de edad, labora para ENACAL como fontanero desde hace 10 años. Esta solicitando su  8vo credito con el objetivo de mejorar su propia casa, pues acaba de pasarse y necesita acondicionar la cocina y los cuartos, ya que necesita que sus hijos esten en un ambiente confortable que le permitan desarrollarse mejor. Cabe señalar que Jader ha utilizado sus creditos para ir mejorando poco a poco su pequeña casita, pues es el patrimonio de sus hijos.
texts.en: Jader, 30 years old, is married and has two children; the older one is five years old and the younger one is two months old. He has worked for ENACAL as a plumber for 10 years. He is requesting his eighth loan to improve his own home. He needs to renovate the kitchen and the rooms because he needs for his children to have a comfortable place where they can grow up well. Note that Jader has used his loans to improve his small home little by little for his children's sake.

loans.use: Renovate kitchen and rooms

loans.name: Longuinos

texts.es:
El señor Longuinos S.  esta agradecido por su cooperación en los dos créditos anteriores lo cuales su negocio a tenido muy bien ingreso. 
Esta nuevamente solicitando un préstamo para comprar materia prima ya que tienen varios pedidos de muebles de madera para elaborar y le esta haciendo falta material. No quiere descapitalizar el negocio, es por eso que esta solicitando su cooperación en este crédito.
Planea pagar el crédito con una parte de las ganancias del negocio ya que es la fuente de ingreso de su familia y tiene tres hijos que actual mente están estudiando
texts.en: Longuinos S.  is thankful for your cooperation in the two previous loans which generated very good income for his business. He is again requesting a loan to purchase basic materials since he has various orders to make wooden furniture and he is lacking materials. He doesn't want to decapitalize the business. It is for this reason that he is requesting your cooperation with this loan. He plans to pay the loan with a part of his business' earnings since it is the income source for his family and he has three children that currently are students.

loans.use: Purchase basic materials for business.

loans.name: Virgen De Guadalupe Group

texts.es: La señora Yolanda es la tesorera del grupo “Virgen D. Guadalupe”, grupo qye ah trabajado con Edaprospo desD. hace 10 años y que se conforma por 15 amigas y vecinas, ella esta casada y tiene 3 hijos, ademas vive del alquiler D. vestuario desD. hace 3 años y comenzo con su trabajo para ayudar a sus hijos. El grupo sabe que alcanzara sus metas con esfuerzo, ayuda D. Edaprospo y D. la Virgen D. Guadalupe por la que comparten su devocion.
texts.en: Yolanda is the treasurer of the Virgen D. Guadalupe group.  This group has worked with Edaprospo for 10 years and is maD. up of 15 friends and neighbors.  Yolanda is married and has 3 kids and to take care of them she has operated a clothing rental business for 3 years.  The group knows that they will reach their goals with hard work, help from Edaprospo and from the Virgen D. Guadalupe group to which they are very devoted.

loans.use: To purchase products and supplies.

loans.name: Jose Emilio

texts.es: Jose Emilio de 33 años de edad es soltero, labora para la Alcaldia de Juigalpadesde hace 2 años como ayudante de albañil. Esta solicitando su 2do credito con el objetivo de terminar de construir un cuarto en su casa,ya que con el credito anterior solo logro comprar parte de los materiales, por eso desea esta vez ver concluido el pequeño cuarto y asi brindarle mayor comodidad a su familia.
texts.en: Jose Emilio, 33 years old, is single. He has worked for the Alcaldia de Juigalpadesde for two years as a bricklayer assistant. He is requesting his second loan so that he can finish construction on a room in his house because with the previous loan he was only able to buy part of the materials. Therefore, this time he wants to see the small room be completed and thereby make his family more comfortable.

loans.use: Construction on a room

loans.name: Isaias Israel

texts.es: Isaias de 24 años de edad es soltero, labora para la Alcaldia de Juigalpa desde hace 2 años como ayudante de albañil. Esta solicitando su 2do credito con el objetivo de terminar deconstruir un cuarto en su casa, y contar con mayor privacidad, pues el credito anterior solo le alcanzo para comprar parte de los materiales.  Espera en el futuro poder tener su propia vivienda para poder ofrecer mejores condiciones a su familia cuando la forme.
texts.en: Isaias, 24 years old, is single. He has worked for the Alcaldia de Juigalpa for two years as a bricklayer assistant. He is requesting he second loan to finish construction on a room in his house so that there will be more privacy. With the first loan he was only able to buy part of the materials. He hopes to have his own home in the future so he can provide better living conditions to his family when he has one.

loans.use: Construction on a room

loans.name: Luis Manuel

texts.es: Luis Manuel  de 57 años de edad es casado,tiene 3 hijos, todos mayores y con su propia familia, labora para el MINED desde hace 25 año como docente en una escuela de Tecolostote. Esta solicitando su 9no credito con el objetivo de continuar mejorando su casa, esta vez construyendo la division de los cuartos, ya que actualmente es de playwood y esta en mal estado.
texts.en: Luis Manuel is 57 years old, and he is married. He has 3 older children who have their own families. Luis Manuel has been working for MINED for the last 25 years as a teacher in a school in Tecolostote. He is requesting his 9th loan with the objective of continuing to renovate his house. This time he is constructing the divisions between the rooms, since presently the divisions are made of plywood and are in a bad state.

loans.use: Room repair

loans.name: Maria Del Refugio

texts.es:
La señora María Del Refugio C. ya ha tenido un crédito con Kiva, el cual pagó puntualmente y está muy agradecida por su cooperación en ese préstamo. 
Doña Maria, se dedica a la venta de ropa y zapatos por catálogo, este negocio es la fuente de ingreso de su familia ya que es madre soltera y tiene una hija bajo su responsabilidad. 
Solicita nuevamente un préstamo para poder surtir ya que tiene varios pedidos de zapatos y ropa, en este momento no cuenta con el dinero necesario para la inversión, es por eso que solicita su cooperación para este crédito y así poder comprar lo que le están encargando sus clientes.
texts.en: Mrs Maria del Refugio C. has already had a loan with Kiva, which she payed punctually. She is very grateful for your support of that loan. Mrs Maria del Refugio sells clothing and shoes through a catalogue. This business is her family's source of income, since she is a single mother with a daughter under her care.
